fuller, and this time Dowrich gets onto the front foot. Driven back to Perera
full, on the fourth-stump line. Blocked from inside the crease
length ball outside off, and spinning into him. He makes some room, and then cuts it late past the slip fielder. More runs for Dowrich
back of a length outside off, and angling into Dowrich. Tiptoes and defends it towards the leg side
yorker outside off, and Dowrich squeezes it away. Played to deep point for a walking single. On a Nelson now
back of a length outside off, but skidding into Roach this time. Her offers his bat off the backfoot, and the ball finds his outside edge. Trickles down to point
full outside off, and Roach drives it like a top-order batsman. Proper footwork and then drills it to cover. A shame that a fielder is manning that region. Deserved a boundary for that shot!
innovative! Exposes all three stumps to try and cut it past point, but misses the shot completely. It was full outside off, and Roach will feel lucky he's not bowled
full outside off, and Roach walks towards the line of the ball. Glances it to cover on this occasion
full on middle, and that's been clipped to the leg side. Hits the fielder at short leg, but his pad saves him from any injury
good length outside off, and turns sharply into his pads. Done in by the extra bounce, and the ball hits his groin region. All good
full outside off, and driven between cover and mid off. Herath rolls back the years to put in a diving effort and stop the boundary. Smiles all around
loopy outside off, and defended towards the leg side
full outside off, and turning into Roach's pads. Worked towards the leg side
turn, but perhaps too much! Length ball on off, but hits Roach's pad on leg stump. Would've gone down leg
full on middle, and too easy for Dowrich. Clips it off his pads to the sweeper fielder on the leg side
full on off, and this time it's been flicked to midwicket
back of a length outside off, and Roach gets inside the line of the ball. Defended off the back foot
full on off, and driven firmly down the ground. Excellent shot, in fact, as it races away to the long-off boundary. Timing....
back of a length outside off, but the ball stays very low! Roach is deceived by that, and can't even get bat to ball. Misses his back-foot defense, and the ball goes to the keeper on the bounce
back of a length on middle, but Dowrich shuffles across to the off side and flicks it past the fielder at leg gully. Whipped!
full outside off, and turning into the batsman. Nudged to the leg side
full outside off, and defended back to Perera off the front foot
loopy, but full outside off. No spin this time, and Roach comfortably taps it back to the bowler
flighted outside off, and Roach wants to go for the money shot. Drills a drive, but straight to Vandersay at cover
full outside off, and Roach takes a big stride forward. Bat-pads it this time
loopy once more. Full outside off, and blocked off the front foot
proper flight like a part-time bowler. It's a full toss on middle, and Dowrich defends to mid on
half-tracker on middle, and Dowrich gets onto the back foot and thumps it past the midwicket region with precision. Easy pickings
full on middle, but Dowrich defends it off his bat's inside edge behind square on the leg side
full outside off, and Roach wants to join the party. Roach slices a drive, but it goes over backward point. Fifty partnership
length ball outside off, and turning away from Roach. He stays on the back foot and punches it to deep extra cover
half-tracker outside off, and turning further away. Dowrich mistimes a cut to the man at deep point. Expensive over
full outside off, and he slogs this towards the leg side. Not off the bat's middle, but still hit along the ground. Cow corner cleans up
extra flight outside off, and Dowrich drives it to Herath at long off for a walking single

full on middle, and Roach misses the slog. Hits his front leg, and the lbw appeal is given! Roach reviews straightaway. Bat first? Replay time. Nothing conclusive on the replay, and even UltraEdge doesn't show any bat. It'll come down to ball-tracking now. Pitched on off, but turning way too much. The ball's missing leg stump, so Roach survives! Terrific review, eh.
flighted outside off, and defended off the front foot to the bowler
good length on middle, and worked off his pads to the leg side. Sharp work from short leg this time
tossed up outside off, and defended back to Perera. That's the end of over no. 150.
full just outside off, and defended off the front foot to Herath
length ball outside off, and Dowrich shuffles in his crease before cutting to point. Was in two minds there
full on leg stump, and Dowrich flicks it to midwicket. Well stopped by the infielder
length ball outside off, and Dowrich attempts the cut once again.Can't find the gap though
length ball outside off, and Dowrich works it off his pads to midwicket. Can't turn the strike over
fuller on off, and he's down on one knee. Sweeps it to the fielder at fine leg for a run. He'll keep strike
full on middle, and that's been swept with the spin. Straight to fine leg though
tossed up on off, and Roach ain't playing around no more. Big stride forward, and proper followthrough of the bat as he swats it over the bowler's head. Timed!
full outside off, and played with the spin to midwicket
flatter, and quicker. Length ball outside off, and Roach punches it back to Dilruwan
slogged over long on! Almost into the stands, and that's the game's first six. Full outside off, but picks the spin early, and slogs it over the non-striker. The crowd cheers

edged, but just past first slip! That's four more. Length ball on middle, but angling across his body. Tries to punch it off the back foot, but takes the outside of the bat. Unlucky for Perera, but that's 15 off the over. Ouch.
length ball on off, and worked off his pads to the fielder at deep backward square
length ball on middle, and Roach gets inside the line of the ball. Flicked to the vacant square leg region
length ball on off, and straightening after pitching. Dowrich stays on the back foot and defends
length ball on off, and angling into his pads. Tapped to mid on off the back foot
back of a length outside off, and that's been pulled to mid on. Herath dives and misfields, but doesn't cost his team any extra runs
full on leg stump, and worked off his pads to square leg. Roach'll keep strike

drilled, but taken at mid off! Length ball outside off, and he smacks this hard and straight. The ball was flying, but the fielder times his jump to perfection. An excellent catch to end the partnership. Drinks as well
good length, slanted across wide outside off , left alone
length ball outside off, left alone. Dickwella gets a knock on his fingers trying to catch this dying ball
length ball outside off, hangs his bat out to be beaten
bouncer too short, ducks under it
outside edge falls short of second slip. Straightens in the corridor and he looks to defend with soft hands
length ball angled in at off stump, blocked on the front foot. Some late inswing
yikes. Outswinger lands very short and very wide. Lands in front of first slip who manages to stop it

only one of them was naturally suited to play out the session! Perera chucks his hands at a very wide ball and lobs one straight to backward point off the toe-end. It's another very short and wide ball from Roach, with some swing away. He's through the shot very early. The fielder jumps early too but does well to wait and not grab as he's going down. Takes it at chest height
length ball lifting up outside off, left alone
short of a length outswinger, too wide to make him play
nicely played. Length ball jumps up at Chandimal in the corridor, but he's nicely on top of it to dead-bat it
length ball angled in at off stump. Solidly defended from the crease
zips into him and wakes him up. That's a mean one first up. 144kph, angled into Mendis who stabs at it and gets a glove onto thigh guard that lands safely
oh yeah, now we're talking. An outswinger after angling in, fizzing away from the bat in the corridor, hung out unceremoniously with the front foot rooted to the crease
lovely. Mendis is such a classy batsman. Allows this short of a length rocket to come close to him in the corridor and with a deft deflection, with a high elbow, guides it past gully
'ooooh!' goes the crowd! Gabriel makes Mendis jump away. Short ball perfectly directed, coming in at his right shoulder. He does well to get out of the way
spicy. 149kph, short of a length, angling in at leg stump and then nipping away to fly past the outside edge and over the stumps
length ball on off stump, defended watchfully from the crease
short of a length outswinger, very wide outside off. Left alone
skids low. Angles in, then goes out late, then has the cheek to stay low. Chandimal must sue. Looks to defend with soft hands but that skids through
length ball down leg side, can't get bat on the attempted glance
short and wide, left alone
short of a length at off stump, solidly behind to defend
length ball in the corridor, defended off the front foot
flies to the fine leg boundary. 143kph length ball on the pads, Mendis does enough
length ball at a sixth stump line, gratefully left alone
literally bowls to his field. This isn't far from leg gully. Attempted inswinger pitches wayyyyyy down leg side
well played. Gets on top of this length ball outside off, taps it to mid-off's left

has that carried? Holder at third slip looks convinced. Aleem Dar is going upstairs, soft signal is out. Mendis stuck in the crease again as the length ball comes in and cuts away. Gabriel hasn't overstepped. And on first look, this looks out...out says Ian Gould. Well done, Holder. Uses his reach to get his fingers under this. Gabriel gives ten runs in extras and then produces a good ball against a nervous opener. Sri Lanka are in big trouble

dropped! Holder has put down an easy one! Oh dear. Is that going to be a big moment? Angelo Mathews back in the dressing room would have deflated Sri Lanka irreparably. Length ball in the corridor, he gets squared up trying to defend and Holder cops this on the forearm
full ball shaping away late, Mathews' feet stuck as he stabs this away off the outside half
length ball outside off, keeps low as he hangs his bat outside off stump. Rolls through to Dowrich
length ball swinging away outside off, left alone
good length, slanted in at off stump. Defended into the leg side
full and in at the stumps. Anxiously pokes it to midwicket
ouch this looks bad. Chandimal looks to get forward to defend outside off and cops one on the forearm. It's hit the seam and gone onto whack his right hand. Some extra bounce there...
length ball outside off, left alone
probing. But not seductive enough. Chandimal lets another one go in the corridor

knocked him on the helmet. Is there a glove on it too? Doesn't seem to be an appeal after gully takes this. Slow-mo shows no glove. Mathews is rattled. On his feet, but visibly rattled. He was taking his eyes off this and was in no way in position to avoid the bouncer. He's clutching the right side of his head. That wasn't far from the unprotected area of the head...but he's okay. He'll bat on.

no respite. 145kph bouncer at his face again. Mathews arches back and lets this go. Uffff this is brutal. Dowrich leaps and can't gather cleanly, but Mathews is not aware of the run available. How could anyone be...
nervous poke into the off side. Bouncer outside off. Leaps off the floor, jabs away from the body and wants the run before stopping himself abruptly after a first step
hangs back and slashes at this short one outside off. Wide gully dives to his right and tells Mathews the test isn't over
length ball outside, pokes it into the cover region off the toe-end. All the catchers means there's a single there. And time to breathe for Mathews
full ball outside off, left alone
length ball, outswinger, wide outside off. Left alone
short of a length and coming in at off stump. Defended off the back foot
tucks it aerially towards fine leg. Short ball at his hips and he jumps-and-stabs
length ball in the corridor, some late swing away. Defended to point with soft hands
short and very wide. Chases after it with a cut. No feet. Poor choice. Beaten
short and wide outside off, left alone
nicely played. Stands solidly behind the line of this short ball outside off and jabs it wide of mid-off
short ball slanted into the corridor, left alone
past the outside edge. Angles into him, he wants to defend close to the body. But that snakes away off the pitch
short ball outside off, left alone
short ball outside off, poked through cover point off the back foot to get his first run

whips it away. Mathews with the guts. You don't play 73 Tests if all it takes is a bouncer. Stands tall, gets behind the line and uses the angle to pull this to the square leg boundary. Lets out a deep breath as he punches gloves with Chandimal
short ball outside off, left alone
short of a length outside off, stands tall and jabs it through cover
short of a length outside off, left alone
short of a length outside off, punched to extra cover off the back foot
length ball shaping away, too wide to make him play
short ball at off stump, defended off the back foot
short and very wide. Spanked away to the cover boundary off the front foot. Mathews loves that

got him! What a ball. Length ball angled in from wide of the crease, Late swing away and some bounce as Mathews pokes with hard hands. Carries to third slip who takes it. But hang on. Has Holder overstepped? You know what, there's nothing behind the line when his front foot lands. A bit of his ankle has landed on the line. But the third umpire deems this is good enough. Holder is relieved. His luck might just have turned. He has Mathews eventually. But that is a contentious decision. I'm not sure it's the right one.
falls short of first slip. Length, lift, swing away to catch the outside edge. But it's well in front of the fielder
short one on leg stump, tickled to fine leg off the back foot
nice line. Short of a length and climbing up at the corridor. Left alone
full and wide outside off, left alone
full outside off once again, Roshen shoulders his arms
length ball outside off, and seaming away after pitching. He's happy to let it go
fuller outside off, and this time he leans into the drive. Takes a small step forward and caresses this down the ground
full outside off, and swinging further away. No reason for the batsmen to play at it.
full just outside off, and this time it straightens after pitching. Roshen attempts a straight drive down the wrong line. The ball whizzes past his outside edge
full on off, and angling into his pads. A small shuffle of the feet, and then caresses this past mid on with pure timing
back of a length outside off, and this time he shoulders his arms. Through to the keeper
full outside off, and this time it's been defended off the front foot. Firmly played
back of a length outside off once again. Too far from the batsman for him to work with it
back of a length outside off, but angling into the batsman. He lets it go through, and the ball goes over the top of off stump
short outside off, and this time it's that uneven bounce. Flies over the keeper's outstretched right hand as well for byes
length ball outside off, and angling into his pads. Skiddy delivery, and it's been glanced to backward point

leg stump gone! They'll check for the no ball though. Naw, he's good. It was quick, full and on leg stump. The batsman missed the leg-side flick, and the ball hits his front leg and then crashes into the stumps. Sri Lanka in dire straits.
back of a length outside off, and he's happy to let the first one go
back of a length outside off, and seaming further away. No shot offered by Dickwella
full on leg stump, and going further down. A diving effort from Dowrich ensures it doesn't leak for byes
length ball outside off, and angling away. Dickwella thought of punching it straight, but pulls out as the ball goes away from him

full outside off, and this time the cover drive comes off the bat's inside half. Played past the non-striker in fact, and mid off has to go chasing behind it. They could've taken the second though, but the batsman simply jog
full on leg stump, and that's been clpped off his pads to deep backward square. Uses his wrists to place it behind square
length ball outside off, and he blocks it off the back foot. Played back to the bowler
length ball outside off, and he stays on the back foot. Opens his bat's face and taps it towards point. The fielder intercepts
back of a length on off, and angling into his body. Uncomfortably played to square leg, but the umpire suggests it's come off his thigh pad
short! Pitching on leg, and forcing Dickwella to duck under the line of the ball. Much more even - the bounce - this time
full on off, and Chandimal gets onto the front foot. Defended towards the non-striker this time

full outside off, and now Chandimal brings out the square drive. Hit between point and gully, and Bishoo goes chasing behind it. Sliding effort in the deep helps him throw the ball back quickly, but the batsman comfortably come back for three
length ball outside off, but seaming further away. He lets it go

fuller outside off, and he goes for the drive. Threw his hands at it, but manages to top-edge it over gully. Played with hard hands, and that probably saves the batsman. Flies over the infield for four. Team fifty as well
length ball outside off, and going away from Dickwella. Left alone

full outside off, and that's been beautifully check-driven past the cover region. Chase for the fielder. and he manages to parry it back. But looks like his hand was touching the ropes while bringing the ball back into play. Boundary
overpitched outside off, and Chandimal's quick to get into the position for a drive. Struck well, but intercepted by cover
length ball on middle, and that's been tapped towards the leg side. Comes off the bat's top half, so it's in the air for a bit. Lands safely in front of midwicket though
overpitched, but wide outside off. Chandimal's happy to shoulder his arms
crazy! Full outside leg stump, and going further away. No chance for Dowrich, whose diving effort is still far away from the ball. Free runs
back of a length outside off, but too wide for the batsman to want to mess with it. Lets it go
full outside off, and he gently fends it towards cover. Misfield from the infielder, but he recovers well
length ball on off, and blocked off the front foot
back of a length on middle, and flicked off his hips to square leg. Comfortably collects a single
full outside off to Dickwella, and he shoulders his arms. More than happy to leave the balls outside off alone
full on off stump, and this time it straightens after pitching. Forces the batsman to play at it this time. Tapped towards cover point
full, but outside off. Dickwella gets to the pitch of the ball but doesn't offer any shot
full just outside off, and he comes onto the front foot. Firmly fended towards short cover
length ball on off, and that's been punched off the front foot to mid on. Roach collects and has a shy at the non-striker's stumps. Hits it as well! But Dickwella was always in
length ball outside off, and this time Chandimal slices it behind point. No real footwork there, but used his bat to flay this away from his body. Proper use of the crease's depth as well
full on off, and he gets inside the line of the ball. Pushes it towards mid on
overpitched outside off,and that's been driven square to point. Almost a yorker on this occasion
length ball outside off, and Chandimal tiptoes to play a shot. Fended back to the bowler
fuller outside off, and that's been pushed off the front foot between cover point and cover. Chase goes chasing (yes!) after it
full on off, and Dickwella comes forward to drive. Played straight back to the bowler though
length ball outside off, and Dickwella gets behind the ball's line. Pushes it towards cover. Takes off for the single and that's 1000 Test runs for Dickwella
back of a length outside of, and Chandimal rides the bounce. Defended off the back foot
full on middle stump, and that's been flicked off his pads to the man at fine leg. He'll collect the single
back of a length on middle, sliding down the leg stump though
back of a length outside off, seaming away from Dickwella, and he shoulders his arms. Variable bounce, and it goes to the keeper on the half-volley
short and wide outside off. A loose ball to start his spell. Left alone
back of a length outside off, and he rides the bounce to fend it back to the bowler
length ball on off stump, and Chandimal takes a big stride forward. Blocked
full outside off, and seaming away from Chandimal. Chooses to let it go
full on leg stump, and Chandimal shuffles across to the off side. Tries to flick to the leg side, but misses. Through to Dowrich
full on middle, and Chandimal drives to midwicket. Hit well, but finds the fielder
good length on leg stump, and that's been nudged to midwicket. No run
good length on leg, but angling across Dickwella. Played off the back foot to cover point
length ball, but outside leg stump. Dickwella misses a wristy flick, and the ball goes through to Dowrich
good length on leg stump. Tapped off the back foot to square leg, and they take off for a quick single
sweeet! Perfect straight drive. Full on off, and Chandimal has all the time in the world. Small stride forward and pushed past the bowler's left. Mid off has no chance either
back of a length on off, and comes in sharply. Hits Chandimal near his gut, and he needs a moment to recover. Ouch. The physio has a look but Chandimal's good to continue
length ball outside off, and seaming away from Dickwella. Left alone
length ball outside off, and Dickwella stays on the back foot. Plays it towards cover, and has enough time to scamper across for one
leading edge! But goes along the ground to point. Length ball on off, and straightens after pitching. Chandimal offers the defense, but the ball comes off the bat's outside half
appeal for lbw, but turned down. Full on middle, and angling down the leg side. Chandimal misses the flick, and it hits his front leg. Reckon that's going down leg
length ball, but outside off stump. Chandimal's more than happy to see it through to the keeper
length ball on middle, but going down the leg side. Chandimal easily whips it off his hips to fine leg for a single. He'll keep strike
length ball on middle stump, and going down leg. Tries to work it towards square leg, but comes off the pad's top half. Goes through towards square leg
length ball outside off, and this time Dickwella's punch comes off the bat's bottom half. Goes through to second slip
full on off, and Dickwella drives it behind square. Takes an awkward bounce, and hits Chase near his neck. Hope he's fine
length ball on middle, and going away from Dickwella. Offers his bat's full face as it comes off the outside half. Through to point
length ball on middle stump, and Dickwella gets behind the line of the ball. Punches it to Holder, who misfields. But mid on is backing up
quicker ball, but this time it's down the leg side. Dickwella tries to play it down down the leg side, but it comes off his back thigh. Races away to fine leg for a boundary. Drinks as well
short of a length ball on off stump, blocked on the back foot
keeps it out! Not sure that's reverse, but it bends in nastily. Full and in at middle stump. Chandimal falls over and stabs this into the midwicket region
short of a length outside off, tapped into the covers from the crease
short ball slanted across off stump, left alone
beaten. Climbs off a length and Dickwella looks to feel for it away from the body
length on off stump, defended on the front foot
short of a length on off stump, dead-batted into the covers
length ball fired down leg side, left alone
short of a length and zipping away in the corridor. Defended off the back foot
short of a length at off stump, defended off the back foot
length ball on off stump, defended from the crease
tickled away. Poor line from Cummins. Onto the pads at back of a length. Plenty of time for him to pick up four at fine leg
short ball outside off, stabbed through cover off the back foot
short of a length on off stump, defended with soft hands
short of a length outside off, left alone
good length on off stump, blocked on the front foot
nicely guided. Short ball outside off and he taps it past gully using the face of his bat
length ball wide outside off, left alone
length ball swinging away late, left alone
length and far down leg side. Looks to whip it away, can't get bat on it
length on the pads, whipped away through square leg
bouncer first up, sliding down leg and easily let go
length ball outside off, inside edge as he looks to push it on the up through the covers
short of a length at off stump, pushed to point with an open face
beaten. This skids through quickly as Dickwella looks to stab at it
length ball wide outside off, left alone
beaten. Lots of room on this short ball and he looks to spank it through cover, but it's slipped through from underneath
length ball shaping away in the corridor, left alone
bouncer very wide outside off, left alone
length ball outside off, punched on the up to extra cover
length ball at leg stump, flicked to fine leg
length ball just outside off, pushed into the off side
short of a length on leg stump, tapped through midwicket off the back foot
short of a length on middle stump, defended into the leg side
length ball fired down leg side, left alone
short ball outside off, left alone
pinches a single. Good quality batting. Gets right behind the line and deftly drops this in front of point
length ball on middle stump, clips it wide of mid-on with soft hands
length ball on middle stump, pushed down the pitch off the back foot
pick-up shot that Dickwella usually plays a lot more of. Can't remember one before this in this innings. Lifts it off a length and gets it to fine leg on the bounce
length ball on off stump, blocked on the front foot
short of a length at off stump, tapped into the off side
full on off stump, pushed to mid-off from the crease
floats up a full toss outside off, it's punched to long-on
slider at a length on off stump, pushed back down the pitch
slower, tossed up at off stump and marginal turn away. Comfortably blocked on the front foot
full on off stump, driven back to the bowler
length ball on leg stump, flicked to midwicket
slider at off stump, defended on the front foot off the inside half
short of a length ball in at leg stump, flicked through the open square leg area
slaps it over. Fully in control. Short and wide outside off and Chandimal moves his weight backwards to lift it over point on the up

glorious. Slowly taking control of the match, SL's captain. Length ball outside off. He hasn't gotten close t the pitch, but the hands have come down late as he caresses it wide of extra cover, to his right
length ball on off stump, defended off the back foot
length ball wide outside off, left alone
length ball outside off, left alone
lobbed up at middle stump and once more, Dickwella hits it on the full. Gets down and laps it to long leg's left
length ball on middle stump, punched back to the bowler
short ball turning in at the stumps. Backs away and slices to cover's left
beaten in flight but he manages to adjust. Steps out and pushes to extra cover. Some turn for Bishoo.
length on off stump, pushed to extra cover on the up
short ball on off stump, backs away and cuts straight to extra cover
full and slanted in at off stump from around the wicket, driven firmly to mid-off

lovely! It's not a very fast pitch, so this punch on the up is not easy to do. Length ball outside off, gets nicely in line with a stride forward and opens the face at the last moment after offering the full face. Gets it wide of mid-off
full at off stump, driven uppishly to mid-off
short ball down leg side, looks to pull and can't get bat on it
length ball outside off, punched to cover on the up
jags back in to the batsman's surprise. It's slanting away from off before landing. He gets an inside edge, rooted to the crease. It's also a no-ball though...
overpitched outside off, watchful tap to short extra cover
length outside off, pushed into the covers with the turn
well the bowler hasn't managed to spin one into Dickwella so far. Another full toss. Picked from outside off for a single at long leg with a lap sweep
length on off, defended on the front foot
extra bounce. Length ball lifts up as he leans in to defend
short of a length on off stump, punched to sweeper cover off the back foot
length ball turning in at off stump, defended into the covers

poor shot. That is poor from Chandimal. Probably the last over before lunch. It's a short and very wide ball outside off. He's looking to go over point with a cut but ends up playing well away from his body and slicing it feebly for the fielder there
full ball speared in at middle stump, leans in and hurriedly nudges it through the open mid-on region
length ball at off stump, defended from the crease
brave leave. Length ball slanted into the corridor, he shuffles and withdraws. That was close to the stumps
nicely timed. Length ball into the body and he offers the full face again to tap it through mid-on
length ball headed for the top of off. Blocked watchfully from the crease
half-tracker on off, and Dickwella backs away to cut it past the cover point region. Runs straight away
length ball outside off, but spinning into his body. Turned off his hips to the fielder at short leg
length ball on off, and spinning inwards. Clipped towards square leg
slower through the air, length ball outside off. Tentatively fended away off the back foot
length ball on off and turned off his pads to the leg side. Cramping Dickwella for space
outside off once again, and Dickwella comes forward. Blocked off the front foot

dropped! The look on Chase's face says it all. Full and wide outside off, and Perera goes for the extravagant drive. Chase - at point - comes forward, but the ball keeps dipping, and it pops out of his hands. Gabriel ain't pleased
full outside off, and this time Perera ensures he stays wary. Shoulders his arms
length ball outside off, and Perera takes a big stride forward to cover his line. Then lets the ball go through to the keeper
caressed through cover! Overpitched outside off, and that's been driven off the front foot. Played squarer than he would've liked, perhaps, but no one's at the deep either
length ball on off, and he comes forward to fend it with soft hands. Played towards the non-striker
full outside off, and Dickwella defends with soft hands. Angling into him from around the wicket
extra flight, and lands full on middle. Gets his front foot out of the way and drives towards the non-striker
full just outside off, and tapped towards cover. Calls nice and early for a single
length ball outside off, and he's got room to free his arms. Gets his front leg towards the on-side and punches through the covers. Man in the deep though
flatter, and lands on off. Dickwella goes onto the back foot, and blocks
full on middle, but sharply turning across Dickwella. Comes off his pads as the ball goes towards legslip
back of a length outside off, and takes some extra bounce. Perera lets it go through to Dowrich
full on leg stump, but Perera misses out on the flick through midwicket. Hits his front leg
full on off, but Perera drives down the wrong line. It takes the inside edge and goes towards midwicket instead. Enough time to take the single
full on off, and angling further away. Driven away from his body, but mistimed to wide mid off

full outside leg stump, and Dickwella tries to whip it behind square. Misses, and it hits his pad. Forces Dowrich to dive to his right and stop the ball from going for four. But he's overstepped. Again.
lucky! Almost chopped on. Length ball outside off, which he tries to punch towards cover. Through his shot too early so the ball whizzes past leg stump instead. Man in the deep though
short! Pitches outside off, and swings after passing Perera. He ducks
length ball outside off, but turns in sharply. Dickwella skips towards the leg side, and carves it inside out towards cover
full on middle, and he attempts the sweep. Hits his front leg, and pops into Holder's hands at leg slip
length ball outside off, and this time he stays on the back foot. Punched past the non-striker to long on
full outside off, and blocked off the front foot
full outside off again, and fended back to Bishoo off the front foot
full outside off, and spinning away from Perera. Gets onto the front foot and defends towards short cover
back of a length outside off, Dickwella tiptoes and works it towards midwicket. No chance of a run
bends his back to generate some extra pace. Lands on a length outside off, but Dickwella is happy to just continue blocking. Played off the back foot this time
length ball outside off, but angling in sharply into Dickwella's pads. He nudges it off his pads to the leg side, but straight to midwicket
full outside off, and Dickwella takes a couple of steps forward. Blocked through to mid off on this occasion
angling into his pads, and Dickwella manages to rotate the strike. Rides the bounce and works it behind square off his hips. Fine leg cleans up
seaming delivery outside off, which goes further away from Perera. Left alone

proper mix-up! And great presence of mind from mid on to run Dickwella out. Lazy, lazy cricket. He punches this ball to mid on with soft hands, but Perera has his eyes on the ball. That forces Dickwella to check his run, but eventually both batsmen go for the single. Meanwhile, mid on picks the ball up and hit the non-striker's stumps on the full. Dickwella's a proper metre or two away from the crease. Poor cricket
full outside off, and Perera takes a big stride forward. Defended towards cover
full just outside off, and spinning further away. Blocked towards the off side
full outside off, and glanced with the bat's open face to point. Short third man goes chasing after it, and his sliding effort saves an extra run
full outside off, and spinning into Herath. Blocked

full, but wide outside off. Herath walks across to the off side and taps it to point. He's halfway down the wicket but Perera hasn't responded. Could be a run-out, but Chase's throw is all over the place! Nowhere near the keeper. Sri Lanka living dangerously
full on middle, and that's been worked off his pads to fine leg. They walk across for the single
length ball outside off, and he opens his bat's face. Runs it down to third man and there's enough time to take the second
back of a length on middle, and Herath tries to pull. Hits his bat's handle instead
back of a length outside off, and Herath tries to pull uppishly. Off the bat's top half, but the ball lands safely at square leg. Gets off strike
short stuff! Gets big on Perera and he awkwardly defends off the back foot. Gets his bat in front of his face, and the ball hits his glove. Ouch
back of a length outside off, but swings sharply inwards after crossing Perera. Dowrich goes tumbling to his left to stop the ball from leaking through. Fiery
reverse sweep! Full outside off, and he paddles this past the short third man fielder. Chase for the man
full on off, and turning into Herath. Tries to flick it towards the leg side, but the ball hits his front leg
full outside off, and Herath defends carefully off the front foot
full outside off, and he tries to sweep. Misses, and it hits his pad, but impact's definitely outside off
full on off, and he attempts to flick towards square leg. Misses
tossed up outside off, and Herath gets onto the front foot. Proper stride to get to the length of the delivery and then defended back to Bishoo
length ball on middle, but angling into Perera. Goes down the leg side in the end
full, but wide outside off. The ball's seaming further away, and Perera shoulders his arms
good length on middle, and worked off his hips to the man at fine leg. They walk across for the run. Umpire Dar says that it came off his pads
short outside leg stump, and goes down the leg side. Perera doesn't even bother ducking
back of a length on off, but angling across Herath. He tries to punch off the back foot, but can't get bat to ball
back of a length on middle, and Herath punches it with the bat's open face to point. No run on offer
full just outside off, and blocked off the front foot. Played back to Bishoo
length ball on off, and spinning away from the batsman. Played off the back foot to point
full just outside off, and blocked off the bat's open face to cover point
full on off, and he comes down the wicket. Defends but the ball ricochets to the keeper. Dowrich can't hold on, and that saves the batsman. Otherwise he would've been stumped
full just outside off, and blocked off the front foot
length ball outside off, and Perera goes deep in his crease to try and punch it past cover. Finds the fielder there though
soft! One short ball too many, and this time Herath perishes. Gets big on him, but Herath chooses to pull anyway. Off the bat's top half, and goes straight down midwicket's throat
short once again. Lands on middle, but goes down the leg side. Lakmal ducks anyway
gets off the mark with a whip off his pads to fine leg. The ball's angling in, so it's comfortably played down the leg side
good length on middle, and mistimes a shot to square leg. Tried to use his wrists to work it towards square leg, but it comes off his pads instead

length ball on off, but coming right into the batsman's pads. Misses the front-foot defense, and the ball hits his front leg. Appeal for lbw, but turned down by the umpire. Holder considers reviewing, but doesn't after consulting the keeper
back of a length outside off, and seaming further away. Left alone
outside off, and spinning away from Lakmal. Punched off the back foot to cover point
flighted, and lands full just outside off. Defended off the front foot
full on off, and Lakmal comes forward once more to meet the ball on the full. Blocked towards the non-striker
full just outside off, and Lakmal attempts to drive. Played back to Bishoo
flatter, and lands on middle. Lakmal goes back and then muscles this to the sweeper fielder on the leg side. Sri Lanka reach 150
full, but wide outside off. Perera keeps his eyes on the ball and taps it towards cover point
length ball into the pads, pushed into the ground in front of short leg
well bowled. Bouncer up at his eyes, Lakmal sways away
lobs up off the thigh guard and falls safely to short leg's left. I thought there was inside edge on that as Lakmal tried to flick it, but none of the fielders seemed excited
slash and miss. Short and wide outside off. Lakmal a little apprehensive going for the cut. Plays from under it
not apprehensive this time. But another slash and miss. This is a length ball climbing steeply outside off and he chucks his hands at it
short of a length outside off, chopped into the turf and towards point
<b>lovely strike.</b. So clean. Dilruwan gets to the pitch of this flighted ball on off and swipes across the turn to get it nicely over the wide long-on boundary
length ball outside off, dead-batted into the pitch off the front foot
length on off stump, slight turn away. Defended on the front foot
short of a length slider on off, defended off the back foot

got him! Bishoo cramps Dilruwan this time. It's a legbreak that slides on quickly, towards middle from a leg stump line. Dilruwan plants his front leg across the stumps and therefore can't get the bat down straight. Ends up playing for too much turn and this flies off the inside edge to short leg via his pad
tossed up at off stump, blocked on the front foot
makes it 40 extras. A shocking outswinger, pitching at the edge outside off and swinging to go past second slip
short of a length on off stump, defended off the back foot
short of a length at off stump, hurried as he looks to play the pull. Trickles out to midwicket
top edge carries for six from over the keeper. Lakmal won't try to hang around. Bouncer at his ribs and he wants to clobber it, half on the front foot, with a pull.
connects cleanly on the pull this time. It's a short one on his hips, he swivels and gets it to fine leg's left
short ball wide outside off, left alone
good length on off, defended solidly from the crease
short of a length on middle stump, goes on the back foot and whips through midwicket
length on off, blocked on the front foot
short ball again. Looks to punch through midwicket off the back foot but short leg gets in the way and deflects this towards mid-on
length on off stump, front foot defence
full outside off, driven to long-off
yorker on off stump. Manages to squeeze it out to point
shot! A bit of KP in that! Short of a length ball slanted into his middle stump. He gets the legs out of the way and disdainfully swats this past mid-on
length ball slanted in at middle stump. Clears the front leg again, nearly falls over on the back foot. Somehow manages to keep it out
finds mid-on. Goes for another pull as the short ball comes in at his ribs. It's too quick. He gets it off the high part of the bat and lobs it for Bishoo
short ball on middle stump, defended off the back foot
thuds him on the elbow guard. Short one at leg stump, he fends awkwardly at it
short one at middle. Looks to pull, under-edges into the midwicket region
floated up at off stump, defended into the off side
length on off stump, pushed into the off side with the turn
slider at off stump, blocked on the front foot
short of a length outside off, nudged to point on the up
length on off stump, defended on the front foot
full on off stump, keeps it out with the full face
top edge over the slips. Goes short, he looks to pull, he gets it to third man. Very simple.
short ball outside off, takes it on with a pull, can't connect
length ball outside off, pushes with hard hands to mid-off
bouncer slanted into his body. He backs away to try and find some room. But can't connect on his heave
well this is futile. Bangs another in short and is humiliated by the No. 11 who does superbly to create room this time and hammer it past the non-striker with a pull. It's a no-ball too.

Dowrich runs back and holds on. Another short ball. Another attempted pull. It's a top edge that gives the keeper some 10 yards of sprinting to do. He gets under it and holds on. They've checked for no-ball and he's just managed to get his heel behind the line
length ball on middle, and it stays low! Forced to adjust his shot, and clips it towards backward square leg
full just outside off, and this time it curves away from the right-hander. Left alone
length ball just outside off, and straightens after pitching. He gets inside the line of the ball and blocks off the front foot
on the fourth-stump line outside off, and he comes a bit forward to defend with soft hands
back of a length on off, and squares the batsman up. Defends it eventually off the back foot
back of a length outside off, and swinging away. Shoulders his arms on this occasion
length ball on off, and going away from the batsman. Cuts it off the back foot, and manages to pierce the gap between point and cover point
starts off on leg stump, but the ball swings away towards off. Pushed off the back foot to cover this time
back of a length on off, and Smith goes for the pull. The ball's swinging away, so he can only slice it. In the air, but the ball goes over the slip cordon. Smith'll feel lucky
back of a length on middle. Smith goes onto the back foot and plays it with soft hands from near his chest. The ball rolls back to the bowler
full on off, but angling across the batsman. Shoulders his arms. Uneven bounce once again as it stays low while going through to Dickwella
full on off, and shaping nicely away from the batsman. Covers his off-stump line and shoulders his arms thereafter
back of a length outside off, but aimed at off stump. Brathwaite shuffles across and fends off the back foot
extra bounce! Snaring delivery that whizzes past the batsman's helmet. Brathwaite contemplated defending it, but then drops his hands to let the ball go through
back of a length outside off, and that's been pushed off the back foot to the cover region. Finds the gap at extra cover that lets them rotate the strike. Played this from his toes
back of a length on leg stump, and this is only 123kph. He's through his pull too early, so the ball hits his waist instead. It trickles down to fine leg
short! Pitches on off, and loops over the ducking batsman's head
back of a length outside off, but aimed at the batsman's body. Rides the bounce and blocks off the back foot. Soft hands keep the ball on the floor
full on middle, but swinging wildly across the batsman's body. He lets it go through to the keeper
yorker on off stump that Smith blocks back to the bowler. It started from leg stump, but the swing takes the ball in front of off
full outside off, and going away from the left-hander. Takes a big stride forward but then lets it go
full on off, but shaping away from the batsman. Covers his off-stump by shuffling across and then shoulders his arms
full on off and going away from the batsman. Lets it go once again
length ball on middle that ends up outside off. Smith attempts to free his arms, but his cut finds the infielder at cover point. Maiden
full just outside off, but the ball stays low. Defended from in front of off stump
length ball outside off, but shaping further away. He loaded up for the cut shot, but chooses not to play it. Through to Dickwella
length ball outside off, and this time it straightens after landing. Punched off the back foot, but can't breach the gap at cover
length ball outside off, and Brathwaite shoulders his arms after covering his off stump
short to test Brathwaite. He ducks under the line of the ball this time
length ball outside off, and slightly shaping away. Brathwaite's in no mood to engage with it
good length ball on off stump, and Smith rocks back to punch it towards mid off. Diving effort from the fielder stops the single
full on middle, and he taps it towards midwicket. The ball stayed low, so Brathwaite did well to adjust his shot
full outside off, and seams straight through to the keeper. Brathwaite doesn't offer any shot
back of a length on off, and whipped off his hips to the fielder at midwicket. Says 'no' to the single
full outside off, and Brathwaite gets to the pitch of the ball before shouldering his arms to the delivery
full outside off, and the ball swings inwards. Tries to play the cover drive, but the ball comes off the bat's inside half. Mistimed towards the non-striker
full on leg stump, and he misses the nudge off his pads to the leg side. Hits his front leg, but the appeal for lbw is rather muted. Definitely would've gone down leg
short on middle, but Smith's done ducking at the short balls. Lifts his front leg, and pulls it along the ground to deep midwicket

back of a length outside off, but shaping wildly into the batsman's pads. Impact's on middle stump, so they go up for the appeal. Will they review? They discuss, and choose not to. Probably would've gone down leg anyway
full on off but angling into the left-hander. Flicked off his hips to the fielder at square leg
full on leg stump, and he uses his wrists to turn it around the corner to deep backward square leg. Gives Smith the strike again
back of a length on off, and he tries to bring out the pull once again. This time it doesn't connect, and the ball hits his handle and drops near his toes
low full toss on off stump. Bit of an inswing, and that's been driven to mid on. No runs on offer though
full just outside off, and he takes a big stride forward to drive through to cover.Packed infield though
full just outside off, and he pushes this off the front foot past the bowler. Mid off cuts it off
no control behind that delivery and the wild swing that starts off from off stump goes down leg. Brathwaite waits for the ball to come to him, before flicking it very fine to the boundary
full on off, and he nudges it off his legs to the vacant deep midwicket region. Chase for the infielder on the leg side
full outside off, and some late outswing that forces Dickwella to bring out a full-stretched dive. The batsman shouldered his arms anyway

full on leg stump, and straightens after pitching. Misses the leg-side flick, so the ball hits his front leg. Appeal for lbw turned down but they choose not to appeal. Replays say it pitched just outside leg stump
caressed down the ground! Fuller on off stump, and he drives at this with the inswing. Straight as an arrow, and the ball races away to the fence
length ball outside off, and he frees his arms to cut it square. Straight to point
full on leg stump, and slightly quicker this time. Smith can't put it away on the leg side and the ball hits his front pad instead. Impact's way outside leg though
length ball on off, and straightens after pitching. Brathwaite covers the line of the ball and defends it back to the bowler
full outside off, and the ball stays low as it bounces into Dickwella's gloves. Brathwaite doesn't offer a shot
full outside off, and spinning into the batsman. Played with soft hands towards the leg side. Extra bounce off his first ball
slower through the air this time. Full outside off, but smothers it to midwicket off the front foot
uses his feet to meet this full ball, and drives it down the ground to long on. Gives Brathwaite the strike

full just outside off, and that spins crazily away from the right hander. Brathwaite pulled out of his defensive shot, and the ball hits the keeper's gloves and into first slip's hands. They appeal for the catch but the bat was nowhere near
tossed up outside off, and driven down the ground to Herath. He stops it with his left hand, but the ball gets through anyway
short of a length on leg stump, looks to whip this off his hips but cops it on the thigh guard
short ball outside off, chops it past backward point off the under-edge

bowled him but it's a no-ball! Oh no. Such a good ball. Big inswinger from outside off. Catches him trying to defend from the crease with an angled bat and knocks out off stump after beating the inside edge. It's a huge no-ball though

you're kidding me! Devon Smith fetches one from well outside off this time and makes it even between him and the bowler. That's a woeful shot. It's full and very wide. He won't get near the pitch of it no matter how much he stretches the front foot out. Looks to drill it through the covers and gets an inside edge onto the stumps
inswinging length ball on off stump, defended into the leg side off the back foot
short of a length outside off and nicely punched away. It's coming into him and he stays on top of the bounce before tapping it past point
lovely. Looks so good sometimes. Stands on his toes and nudges this very late to deep square leg with the use of his wrists
tossed up at off stump, driven to long-on
full on off, blocked on the front foot
length on off stump, defended off the back foot
floated up at off stump, steps out and blocks
short of a length skidder at off stump keeps low, blocked on the back foot
short ball outside off, cut to point
length and in at off stump, dropped into the covers with soft hands
well bowled. Full ball on middle, swings away late and squares him up a touch. But he manages to offer the full face and keep it out
length ball outside off, blocked into the off side from the crease
length ball on leg stump, flicked to fine leg
length ball wide outside off, left alone
length ball in at middle stump, tapped to mid-on from the crease
draws him in and puts him in two minds. It's slow and outside off on a length. He's itching to push at this but decides to leave
full on leg stump, flicked to midwicket
arm ball skidding in at off stump, defended off the back foot
good length on off stump, blocked on the front foot
good length outside off, blocked on the front foot
short ball wide outside off, makes room and caresses it in front of backward point off the back foot
length ball at off stump, punched off the front foot back to the bowler
length ball wide outside off, left alone
short of a length on off, defended off the back foot
vicious swing into the batsman, but he manages to use the angle to tickle this down to fine leg
outswinger at a length. Very close to off stump. Thinks hard and leaves it alone
length and in at off stump, blocked into the off side
length outside off, nudged into the point region off the outside half of the bat
floated up at off stump, blocked down the pitch
length on leg stump, blocked on the front foot
full on off stump, flicked to mid-on and a quick call through for the run
length ball on middle stump, flicked to midwicket off the back foot
short ball outside off, punched to mid-off's right off the back foot
shot. But extra cover gets in the way. It's overpitched outside off and he climbs into this with an expansive drive. The fielder parries it towards mid-off
inside edge as he looks to pummel one through cover again. Another full ball outside off, but he doesn't get his front leg out a long way this time. Single at fine leg
short ball at off stump, defended to extra cover off the back foot
full on the legs, clipped through midwicket from deep in the crease

taken by the keeper! Loose shot from Brathwaite. Chases a length ball outside off to try and punch it in front of square, but Kumara's a little too quick for him to try that so early in his spell. Hands well away from the body. Dickwella lunges to his right to complete the catch
oh what a ball! Nasty! Length ball banged in at off stump, climbs away rapidly as he tries to defend on the back foot
flighted outside off, and that's been gently driven back to Herath
flatter, and outside off stump. He rocks back to cut, but misses it. The ball goes over the top of his bat. Could've easily taken a nick
flighted outside off, and he comes shimmying down the wicket. Drives towards the on-side, but finds short midwicket
soft hands, and that allows him to get off the strike. Full outside off, and pushed to the vacant cover region this time
length ball outside off, and zipping straight through. Forced the batsman to adjust his line and then punches it back to Herath
full on off, and driven straight back to Herath. Struck well but the bowler got his body behind the ball
full on off, and driven straight past the non-striker's left. Through the mid off region, and the ball races away for four. Classy
of course he follows it up with a bouncer. Pitches on leg stump, and sends the batsman scampering for cover. Ducks under the line of the ball
length ball on middle, but comes into his pads. Hits his front leg and he appeals for the lbw. Turned down by Richard Kettleborough. Would've gone down leg, I guess
goes short again, and Brathwaite ducks. Taken by Dickwella from over his head
length ball on leg stump, but going across Powell. Defended off the front foot to the bowler
variable bounce! Length ball outside leg, but it stays very low. Goes down the leg side and Dickwella has to dive and stop the ball. That'll keep the batsmen on their toes
full outside off, and angling into the right hander. Tapped to the on-side off the front foot
fuller on middle stump, and he makes some room to drive it inside-out to the fielder at sweeper cover. Gets off the mark
full on off stump, and he covers his off stump. Blocks it back to Herath thereafter
full outside off, and he comes skipping down the wicket. Gets to the pitch of the ball, and drives it absolutely beautifully through the covers. Treat for sore eyes
length ball on off, and turning into his pads. Tentatively defended towards short cover off the back foot
full, but wide outside off. He comes down the wicket, and pushes it to Gamage at wide mid on
short outside off, but always going away from the left hander. That allows him to free his arms, and Powell slaps it square past point for an exquisite boundary
full on off, and he leans into the check drive. This is just textbook batting. Plays it straight past the non-striker, and the shot goes to the long-off boundary in no time. Pure balance
short on leg stump, as expected. Forces the batsman to tiptoe and fend it towards the leg side
length ball on leg stump, and he turns it around the corner off his pads to fine leg. They jog across for one

back of a length outside off, and he tries to punch it towards the off side. Plays it away from his body, and the ball takes the outside edge. An epic catch at second slip sends him back. Kusal Mendis, you beauty. Jumps to his right and sticks both hands above his head.
full just outside off, but it's aimed at off stump. Chase covers his off-stump line and defends with the bat's open face to cover point
full on off, and skidding through. Powell rocks back and fends it back towards the bowler
full on off, and driven past the covers to wide long off. Chase for the fielder in the deep, but he manages to cut it off with a diving effort
full outside off, and he drives it against the spin. Well hit, but straight to the fielder at cover
full just outside off, and pushed to short cover off the front foot. Finds the man again
full outside off again, and driven to the fielder at short cover once more. Copycat shot from the last delivery
full, but slower through the air this time. :Lands on off stump, and Chase defends it straight back to the bowler
back of a length outside off, and he taps it to cover. Wants the single, but is sent back by Chase. Good decision from the non-striker as the fielder was quick to pick up the ball
back of a length outside off, and shapes slightly away after pitching. Fended off the back foot to the off side this time
short outside off, and forces Powell to get onto his toes. Blocks this from near his face with soft hands. Ensures the ball stays on the ground
full just outside off, but angling into Powell. Check-driven back past the bowler, but is intercepted by mid off

short on middle stump, and he can't resist the pull. Doesn't time it at all, but the top-edge has enough behind it to go for six over the keeper. Goes for a maximum only because of the bowler's own pace
full just outside off, and he mistimes the drive back to the bowler. Aggression from the bowler, as he picks the ball up in a flash. But chooses not to throw the ball back at the batsman
length ball on off stump, and Chase defends with soft hands
length ball outside off, and Chase once again defends it off the front foot towards the off side
full on off, and defended towards the on-side. Big backlift, but checks his shot in the end
full on off, but skiddy on this occasion. Pushed off the back foot to Herath
tossed up full outside off. Chase leans into the shot, but gently taps it towards short cover
length ball on middle stump, and he stays on the back foot. Sees the ball onto his bat, and then carefully fends it back to the bowler
length ball outside off, and he pokes his bat at it. Plays it towards point, and takes off for the single
full outside off, and it's that variable bounce once again. Powell did try to play the cover drive, but the ball sneaks under his bat and goes through to Dickwella on the bounce
back of a length outside off, and he stands tall to punch it towards cover. Diving effort by the infielder stops the run
full on middle, he takes a step forward. Drives to mid on thereafter, but the fielder's position right here
full on middle, and that's another excellent straight drive to take us through to drinks. Just takes a step forward and then lets his bat's swing do the rest. Bring out the instant replay!
loopy first ball outside off, driven past the bowler's left, but he manages to get a hand to it. Stops the single for certain
flat, and short on off. Chase rocks back and nudges it to the midwicket region to finally get off the mark
back of a length on middle stump, and it's a skiddier delivery. Turned towards the leg side
length ball on off, blocked
full on middle stump, and he takes a huge stride forward. Defended even before the ball could turn
full just outside off, and he comes dancing down the wicket. Driven to long off
full on off and he gets to the pitch of the ball, before flicking it to the sweeper fielder on the leg side
length ball outside off, and the ball comes in sharply. He did try to punch it straight down the ground the played it down the wrong line. Goes just past his outside edge
full outside off, and he leans into the drive on this occasion. Off the bat's middle, but straight to cover
back of a length on middle, and that's been worked off his hips to fine leg. Enough time to walk across for the run
full on middle but angling down leg. He can't flick it with his bat, so the ball hits his pad instead. Trickles down to fine leg, and they collect another run for the team
full outside off, and goes straight through to the keeper. Left alone by Chase
back of a length outside off, and he goes onto the back foot. Punches it to mid on with soft hands, which actually allows them to take the run
full outside off, and sharp turn into the batsman. Tried to drive, but comes off the bat's inside edge and goes to the leg side instead
full outside off, and he comes skipping down the wicket. Defends thereafter
length ball outside off, which he tries to carve towards the offside. Struck to cover point
flatter, and quicker on this occasion. Forces the batsman to stay on the backfoot, and then pushes it to mid on
what a way to get to fifty! Flighted outside off, and he comes down the wicket and lifts it over Herath. Total control
length ball wide outside off, left alone
length ball wide outside off, left alone
length ball wide outside off, left alone
short of a length at off stump, defended off the back foot
narrowly evades off stump. Length ball nips back in sharply as he leaves it alone
length ball wide outside off, left alone
length ball angled into the pads from around the wicket, tucked through midwicket from the crease
short of a length at off stump, punched to extra cover off the back foot
length ball beats the inside edge and catches him on the back leg. Going high and down leg
length at leg stump, pushed into the leg side
length, back foot jab into the leg side
length, forward block into the covers
yorker wide outside off, jams it into the off side
short of a length outside off, left alone
length outside off, punched to extra cover off the back foot
length ball on the pads, whipped to fine leg's right
length ball outside off, defended into the covers
length outside off, driven to cover
length ball on leg stump, pushes it through square leg off the back foot
length on off stump, steps out and jams it to long-on
length outside off, pushed into the point region off the front foot
close. Lets an arm ball go. Hasn't picked it and it's really close to off stump
length on the stumps, punches to mid-on
length on off stump, steps out and drives to long-off
length ball outside off, pushed through point off the front foot
length ball slanted into leg stump, defended into the leg side
too easy. Short and very wide. Can't be faster than 125kph too, that ball. Stretches out and slaps it on the up to the third man boundary
short of a length ball on off stump, defended into the off side
length ball dipping in towards middle stump line. Reaches well in front of the body and pushes to mid-on
full ball down leg side, can't get bat on the flick
short of a length ball skidding away outside off, stabbed past slip with an open face
length ball outside off, blocked on the front foot
length at middle stump, tapped back to the bowler
length on middle stump, pushed down the pitch
good length outside off, defended into the off side
length on middle stump, flicked to short midwicket
length ball outside off, defended off the back foot
length ball outside off. Loopy. Steps out and flicks it to midwicket
short ball on the pads, clipped to short fine
reaches out and stabs at this. Length ball wide outside off, gets it past slip off the thick outside edge
length outside off, steps out and flicks uppishly to long-on

bowled him. This doesn't rise off the pitch at all and has found its way onto the stumps via the pad. Length ball skids through. It was an lbw appeal first before Herath heard it smash into the stumps. He was playing back to one he should have been forward to
length ball on the stumps, whipped through midwicket off the back foot
length ball down leg side, deflects to short fine off the pad as he looks to flick
tossed up at off, tapped to extra cover off the front foot
full on off stump, solidly blocked on the front foot
inside edge as he fails to get to the pitch of this full one. Wanted to drive through the off side with a big gap between bat and pad. Rolls out to deep square
length ball on leg stump, flicked to square leg
good length on off stump, pushed down the pitch
full on off stump, defended
short of a length on the stumps, tickled into the leg side off the back foot
length ball on middle, blocked on the front foot
outside edgebut safely past first slip. Hard hands as Dowrich looks to defend outside off
top edge safely to short fine's right. Looks to sweep and, like when was on 97 in the first innings, fails to execute that shot
length ball at middle stump, defended off the back foot
full outside off, dead-batted into the pitch
short ball down leg side. Waits for it to arrive and guides it past backward square leg
length outside off, blocked on the front foot
length on leg stump, pushed to midwicket off the front foot
fizzes past short leg off the inside edge. Once again, pushes with hard hands against a length ball. Consistent grip appears for the first time in the match...
length on off, blocked on the front foot
tossed up outside off, opens the face and pushes to point
full outside off, blocked on the front foot
length ball, looped right up at off stump. Gets forward too soon and has to wait to dead-bat this
arm ball pushed in at the stump, punched firmly to mid-on off the back foot
full on leg stump, flicked past short leg
full on middle stump, pushed to mid-on off the front foot
short of a length and spinning in at middle stump. Defended to leg slip off the inside half
good length outside off, pushed to mid-on with the turn
length ball outside off, pushed through fast. Blocked off the inside half
short of a length and skidding away from off stump. Defended off the back foot
tossed up at off stump, driven to mid-off
overpitched straightaway, looking for the swing but not finding any. Lands on middle, and defended off the front foot
full on middle once more, and driven across his line to mid on. Straight to the man there
length ball outside off and shaping slightly away. Fended off the back foot
on the fourth-stump line outside off, and blocked off the back foot again. Played towards cover point off the back foot
full on off, and he shuffles across to turn this towards midwicket. Good use of his wrists, but finds the fielder again
full outside off, and driven with the straight bat off the front foot. To mid off
short outside off, and with no spin on offer, Powell rocks back and slaps this in front of cover. With ease
tossed up more, but lands outside off. Spins inwards, and Powell blocks off the back foot. The ball goes to point
flighted on middle, and pushed off the front foot to short midwicket
tossed up outside off, and driven with the spin towards the onside. Finds short midwicket again
full on off, and he goes onto the back foot. Defended
full on off, and Powell leans onto the front foot. Defends it thereafter

fiery! Back of a length outside off, and takes some extra bounce as well. Squares the batsman up as he tries to defend off the back foot. The ball shapes slightly away after pitching, and zips past the bat's outside edge
length ball on middle, but going down leg. Flicked off his pads to the fielder at fine leg
length ball on middle, and Powell covers his off stump, before fending it off the back foot
lands on middle, but angles into the left-hander this time. Surprises Powell slightly, but he manages to whip it off his hips to fine leg
back of a length outside off, and punched off the back foot. Finds short cover
length ball outside off, but seaming further away. Left alone by Dowrich
full outside off, but he comes shimmying down the wicket. Drives it past the bowler to the fielder at long on
full on off, and blocked off the front foot
full on off, but sliding slightly in. Dowrich carefully blocks it away
full on leg stump, and he clips it off his pads towards the leg side. Intercepted by short leg
flighted onto the off stump, but Dowrich check-drives to mid on
full on middle, and Dowrich gets onto the front foot to push it towards short midwicket
full on off, and pushed down the ground. They take off for the double
full outside off, but nowhere near the stumps. Powell prods forward and then shoulders his arms
length ball outside off, and Powell sticks his bat outside off stump. Glanced to point
length ball on off and angling across Powell. Rides the bounce and punches it to the vacant cover region
length ball outside off, and he goes onto the back foot. Tapped to cover with soft hands
full on off and he steps forward to defend it back to the bowler
full on middle stump, and clipped off his toes to the sweeper fielder on the leg side. Enough time to jog across for the single
full just outside off, and driven off the front foot to mid off
full on middle, and turned off his toes to the leg side. Finds short midwicket this time
full on middle stump, and pushed back to the bowler
full on middle, and turned off his pads to the fielder at backward square. Gets off strike
full on middle, but Powell comes down the ground to drive it to long on. He'll keep strike
short ball, and pulled to deep midwicket. Falls just in front of Roshen Silva in the deep. He did try diving forward, but those catches are never easy. Lands just short

full on off, and he drives down the ground. Goes past the non-striker, and that perhaps, blocks the short mid-on fielder from intercepting. The ball races away to the boundary, as there's a small collision between Dowrich and Chandimal
back of a length on middle stump, and he rides the bounce to fend it off the back foot
length ball on middle, and punched off the back foot to cover. They scamper across
full outside off, and driven off the front foot. Stopped by the cover fielder running to his right
length ball outside off, but angling into the batsman. Defended
full outside off, but spins into the left-hander. He covers his off stump, and then taps it towards the leg side
full on off, and clipped off his pads to the vacant square-leg area. Work for the man in the deep
full on off stump, and driven straight down the ground off the front foot. Herath does well to stick his hand out and stop the ball from going for runs
full outside off, and pushed off the front foot towards the off side. Finds cover
full on leg stump, and thumped down the ground. Finds mid on though
length ball on middle, but sliding in. Hits his front leg, but impact's on leg stump. Definitely would've missed the stumps
length ball on leg stump, and nudged off his hips to the sweeper fielder on the leg side
length ball outside off, and Dowrich prepares to drive off the back foot. Checks it eventually, and plays it towards cover

appeal, and given! Full on middle, but sliding inwards. Traps him in front of middle and leg, and the umpire has no hesitation to give that out. Dowrich contemplates reviewing, but Powell asks him to make his way back. First breakthrough of the day
length ball on off, and defended off the back foot towards cover. Gets off the mark
back of a length on middle, and tapped off the back foot to midwicket. Calls nice and early for the single
back of a length outside off, and he rides the bounce to tap it towards the off side. Dribbles away to cover point
full on off, and Powell prods forward to block off the front foot
length ball, but wide outside off. He opens his bat's face and plays it to the vacant region near point. Takes off for the single
full on off, and Holder's in T20 mood. Gets his front leg out of the way and lifts it over mid off. Falls safely beyond the infielder and races away for four thereafter
full just outside off, and this time he chooses to play carefully. Comes forward and defends it to cover
full outside off, and he goes for the drive. Nice connection, but extra cover is now protected
full just outside off. Powell leans into the front-foot defense
short on middle, but that's honestly just a length ball for the tall Holder. Tries to pull, and mistimes it to fine leg
back of a length on middle, and tapped to the midwicket region. Fielder there, but they take the single anyway
short! And this time with some extra pace. Holder ducks under this delivery
back of a length on middle, and Holder walks across to the off side, before flicking it to deep midwicket
back of a length outside leg stump. Too wide, and goes down the leg side. Powell did try to play the ball, but he was nowhere near the ball
short on leg stump, and gets big on Powell before he even knew about it. Hits him near the throat area, but looks like Powell managed to dampen the blow with his glove
full just outside off. Defended off the front foot to the cover region
full on leg stump, and clipped off his legs to the sweeper fielder on the leg side
full on middle, but Powell comes down the ground. Drives through the ball's line - and past Herath - to long on
full outside off, and wide enough for Holder to throw his hands at it. Drives it square past point to the fielder in the deep. Work for the man
full on off stump, but blocked with soft hands off the front foot
full on off, and he comes skipping down the ground. Defends it back to the bowler
length ball on off, and angling into his body. Holder adjusts, and then turns it around the corner to deep midwicket
length ball on middle, and Powell rocks back. Punches it straight down the ground, but mid on's in place. Too sweet a shot to fetch no runs
back of a length outside leg stump. Worked off his pads to fine leg for a walking single
back of a length on middle, but easily tapped off the back foot to square leg. Gets off strike
hits his helmet! But he's okay. Short on leg, and Powell swivels to pull. Through his shot too early, so the ball hits his glove and then ricochets onto his grille
full on leg stump, and driven towards the on side. Finds short midwicket
full outside off, and Holder leans into the forward defense
length ball on off, and he covers his off-stump line. Then pumps it back to the bowler
full on off, and Holder tries to reverse sweep. Misses the shot, and the ball hits his front leg. Appeal for lbw, but Aleem Dar isn't interested. Holder's big stride perhaps saving him
length ball outside off, but the ball stays low. Holder carefully defends with soft hands
reverse sweep again, and this time he manages to get some bat. Manages to play it to the left of backward point, and the ball races away. Exquisitely played
full on middle, and defended towards the leg side. The ball rolls along to midwicket
back of a length outside off, and he tentatively cuts it. The ball rolls away to short third man, whose diving effort stops the ball
length ball outside off, and punched off the front foot. Finds short cover
full just outside off, and he meets the ball on the full. Pushed back to the bowler
length ball outside off, and punched through the covers. Packed infield there though
full outside off again. Driven to short mid off
full outside off, and caresses this drive through to cover. Maiden
slightly tossed up outside off and Holder picks it up and smokes it over cow corner with a clean swing of the arms
tossed up on a length, turned away to midwicket with the turn
shuffles across to a length ball and blocks down the pitch
pitched up outside off, Holder gets the front foot across and gets down on the back knee to sweep behind square; beats deep backward square diving to his right
closes the face to a slider across off and gets a leading edge to point
comes slightly down the track and pats it away to deep square leg
length outside off, opens the face slightly to knock through point
full outside off, blocked to cover
beats him with a fulish length ball that nips away slightly outside off
fullish, cuts in this time, Holder blocks off the front foot through the gap at cover
full and clipped off the toes to midwicket
oh shot! Holder holds his pose on this elegant straight drive. Just stands tall and punches down the ground
gets down to paddle and finds short fine leg

caught! Powell falls short of the century. Looked to come down the ground and flick this from off the toes but fails to keep it down. Just a tad aerial and Vandersay, the sub, dives forward to snaffle a good catch just in front of square
tossed up on middle,blocked
length on off, played to point with a slightly open face
shuffles across and blocks a length ball down the pitch
just back of a length, moves across and defends off the backfoot
pitched up on leg, blocked
flighted on the pads, clipped to short fine leg
flighted up on leg, driven down the ground for one
non-turning length ball outside off, beats the outside edge as he looks to block
full and flighted on the pads, blocked down the pitch
gets opened up slightly by this length ball that shaves the outside edge and lands safely
fullish length outside off, drilled towards mid-on
back of a length outside off, punched to sweeper cover
short of a length, shuffles across and blocks
cuts in from a fullish length and shoots past the inside edge with Bishoo sticking the bat out away from his body
full and curving in on off, blocked down the pitch
short of a length around off, blocked to cover off the backfoot
flighted up on leg, flicked to midwicket
full on the stumps, gets down for a reverse sweep to backward point
advances down the ground and almost yorks himself as he digs it out to mid-off
pitched up on middle and off, driven down the ground
gets down for a big slog but doesn't quite middle it as the ball rolls away to deep square leg
length, spinning in, tucked to fine leg
good length outside off, open the face to point
full outside off, blocked to cover
full outside off, driven to cover
good length outside off, open the face to point
back of a length outside off, stands tall and blocks to cover
shortish outside off, gets on top and steers through point
length on off, blocked to mid-off
flighted up on middle, flicked to the right of midwicket
length ball outside off, blocks it to cover
flighted up on off, driven back
full around off, flicks past mid-on diving to his right
non-turner outside off, pats it to cover
short outside off, Holder walks across but does well to stay away from it
full on the pads, clipped to long-on
short outside off, lashes it through backward of point to bring up the 200
short of a length around off, blocked off the backfoot
shortish, not much room outside off, slashes and misses
short of a length around off, stands tall and punches down the ground

that's plumb. Looks like it. Holder reviews after the umpire raises his finger. Might have pitched outside leg. No under-edge on that as he looks to reverse sweep. Sort of a half-hearted attempt at the shot. Pitching just in line and hitting off. Three reds, and that's the end of Holder
pitches outside leg and hits the pad as he comes forward to block
flighted up on middle, blocked
tossed up on leg, fends it away to the right of Herath
curves it in on the stumps, blocked
full slider on middle, defended into the covers
short and cutting away, lashes at it and gets beaten
full on middle, blocked
short of a length on off, stands tall and blocks
