short of a length, angled in, tucked to deep fine leg
pushed into the covers
short of a length, keeps a little low, Bishoo shuffles across and blocks off the inside of the bat
tossed up on leg, turned to short leg
flighted on leg, pushed to the right of the bowler
flighted up on middle, blocked down the pitch
full on the stumps, blocked
blocks off the front foot and gets a mild inside edge to the pad
full on middle and leg, defended
full, curving in, drilled down the ground off the inside of the bat
short and wide, slashed out to deep point
short, left along as it climbs outside off
back of a length, nips away pretty sharply and late, withdraws his bat at the last moment
fullish length on off, pushed to cover
short of a length outside off, opens the face to deep backward point
length outside off, plonks the front foot forward and defends
slider, blocked off the inside of the bat to the on side
full and sliding in on off, blocked
full and curving in outside off, pushed into the off side
sliding on middle and leg, blocked towards short leg
flighted up outside off, left alone
full outside off, and angling into him. Pushed back to the bowler
full on middle, and he gets down to sweep. Misses, and hits his pad. Appeal for lbw turned down. Would've gone down leg
full outside off, and Bishoo goes for an extravagant drive. Drilled to cover
full on off, and he attempts the drive. Too close to his body for that shot, so Roach finds the outside edge of his bat. Trickles down to third man for a couple
tossed up on middle, and he goes for the leg-side slog. Inside-edged down to fine leg, though
flatter, and wide outside off. Mistimes his cut behind point, and Lakmal at third man goes chasing behind it. His diving effort, though, stops the boundary. Lead of 445 now
back of a length outside off, and going further away. He tries to slap it towards point, but the ball stays low. Goes to Dickwella on the bounce
back of a length on off, and this time it's closer to Bishoo. Times the cut perfectly, but finds deep point

how did that miss middle stump?! Shaping in after pitching, and Roach tries to slog it straight over Lakmal's head. The ball held it's line so the batsman played inside the ball's line. Goes over the top of middle
full on leg stump, and going further down. He tried the slower ball, but couldn't connect
yorker on leg, and he manages to get his bat down in time. Squeezed to fine leg for a single
short on middle, and he tries to slap it over point. Makes room for the shot as well, but the ball soars above his swinging bat
full on leg, and he's gone wildly at it. Smacks it behind square, but deep midwicket cleans up
full just outside off, and driven towards mid on. Except, the ball takes the inside edge, and goes to square leg
full, but wide outside off. Frees his arms to drive through cover, but finds the infielder
full on leg, and slogged towards the leg side. Wanted to go between deep backward square and deep midwicket, but finds the fielder instead
back of a length outside off. Bishoo makes room, and cuts it gently to deep point
full on leg, and drilled to long on off the front foot. They jog across for one
fiery start! Short outside off, and gets big on Mendis. He sticks his bat out but pulls it back in time. Nice carry to Dowrich
full outside off, but holds it's line thereafter. Mendis attempts to defend off the front foot but plays for the incoming ball. The delivery slides just past the outside of his bat
full on off, and driven back to Roach. Well held by the bowler on his followthrough
full, but wide outside off. Swinging further away, so Mendis chooses not to play at it
back of a length outside off, but comes in very sharply. Mendis attempts to defend off the back foot, but the ball hits his hip and bounces away to the slip cordon
full on leg, and clipped off his pads to the deep midwicket region. Enough time to jog back for the second
back of a length on middle, and slapped through the point region. The ball was angling away, so Perera manages to throw his hands at it
full on off, and in the slot to drive. Drilled through cover point, but Roston Chase manages to get his fingertips to it. Takes the pace off the ball and then retrieves it quickly
glorious! Full outside off, and proper followthrough of the bat as Perera drives through the delivery's line. Smacked just past mid off
length ball outside off, and angling into the batsman. Fended off the back foot to short cover
back of a length outside off, and comes sharply into the batsman. The ball goes between bat and pad and through to the keeper. Huge no ball
good length on middle, and clipped off his hips to the square-leg fielder. They jog across for one
back of a length outside off. Mendis rides the bounce and blocks off the back foot
length ball on middle, and angling down leg. He flicks it off his pads to fine leg
width offered outside off, and Mendis cuts it furiously past point. Races away to the boundary, and SL making full use of the hard new ball
length ball outside off. Prods forward and defends towards cover
length ball on middle, but the ball stays low! Goes down the leg side, and takes a tickle of the outside of his pad. The ball goes to fine leg thereafter
wild, wild bounce! That's jumped off a crack on the pitch. Lands on a length outside off, but the delivery lifts off thereafter. Dowrich had to go full-stretch to manage to hold on
full outside off, but the ball doesn't angle in. Holds it's line and goes past the bat's outside edge to the keeper
yorker just outside off. He keeps his eyes on the ball and squeezes it away to point
back of a length outside off. Too wide, and so Perera tries to drive at it. The ball goes over his bat though

taken at first slip! Are they checking for the no-ball? Nope. Back of a length outside off, but angling into Perera. He tries to work it towards the leg side, but the ball takes a leading edge and finds itself inside Smith's hands. One down, nine more to go.
full on off, and driven square off the front foot. Finds the gap between point and cover, but Chase does well to parry it back from near the boundary
full on middle, and clipped off his toes to midwicket. They scamper across for one

a beaut! They're very confident that he's nicked it, but the umpire's not convinced. Huddle in the middle, and West Indies opt not to review. Interesting. The way they appealed, West Indies looked sure that was out. The ball was back of a length outside off, but straightened after pitching. Took some extra bounce and whizzed past the bat's outside edge. Replays say that Mendis had edged it. Oh dear, chance goes begging.
length ball outside off, and defended off the back foot towards the off side
length ball outside off and going straight through to the keeper. Extras though
full on middle, and driven straight. Takes the bat's inside half, though, and therefore goes to deep midwicket. Chase cleans up
back of a length outside off, but Mendis tiptoes and cuts it past the two infielders on the off side. Runs away to the point boundary
back of a length outside off again, but Mendis repeats his slapshot off the back foot. Not hit as well this time, but still allows them to take a couple
good length outside off, and angling into Mendis this time. Fended with soft hands
full on off, and he comes forward to defend it back to Roach
full on leg stump, but going further down. The batsman misses the clip off his toes, and Dowrich jumps to his left to collect the ball
full just outside off, and Chandimal prods forward to block. Played back to the bowler
full outside off, and the ball tails in late. Drives it square off the front foot, and fielder at point goes chasing after it
good length outside off, and he rides the bounce to defend off the backfoot. Firmly played
back of a length on middle, and flicked off his hips to deep backward square. It's a dangerous second run, but the throw is not on top of the stumps. Otherwise, he was run-out.
full on off, and blocked towards mid on. Says 'no' to the single
length ball on leg, and clipped away fine down to the fine-leg boundary. A loose ball from Holder
back of a length outside off, and Mendis tiptoes to defend it towards the leg side
length ball outside off, and seaming a bit away. Mendis tried to play for the ball coming in, so the delivery goes past the bat's outside edge
good length on off, and he goes onto the back foot. Defended towards the off side
full on off, and that's been whipped away to the leg side. Well stopped by square leg though
full on off, and finishes up on middle. Defended towards the leg-side on this occasion
back of a length on middle, and comfortably flicked off his hips to the fielder at fine leg
back of a length on middle, and this time Mendis gets under the ball. Ducks as the delivery goes down the leg side
length ball on middle, and he wriggles it towards the leg side from near his chest
full just outside off, and that's been driven towards mid off. short cover scrambles to his right, and stops the ball from going through
full on leg, and going further down. The batsman shoulders his arms, but Dowrich is very quick to jump to his left and pocket the ball. Good keeping
full outside off, and going straight through
length ball outside off, but seaming away after pitching. Squares the batsman up but doesn't find the outside edge
back of a length outside off, and fended off the back foot
full outside off, and angling further away. Left alone
full on leg stump, tapped towards the leg side by Mendis this time
full on off, and straightening after pitching. Mendis takes a small step forward, and blocks towards mid on. Carefully played
full outside off, and driven off the front foot. Got to the pitch early, but can't time it as well. Dribbles away to cover
back of a length outside off, and too wide from Cummins. Chandimal rocks back, and then punches this in front of cover. Finds the gap, and the ball runs away to the cover boundary

short and wide outside off, Chandimal goes for the uppercut, but the ball goes over his bat. Dowrich has to adjust as well due to the extra swerve, and the ball goes through his gloves. Dowrich's in pain. Looked like that hit the top of his finger on the left hand. Ouch
short again, but aimed on middle stump. Mendis uncomfortably defends off the back foot
length ball on off, but coming into the batsman. He shuffles to the off side and then taps it to midwicket
length ball on off, but the delivery stays low. Blocked off the back foot on this occasion
slower ball to end the over. Back of a length, but Mendis rides the bounce to defend it with soft hands towards the of side. Drinks as well.
short of a length, angled in, gets opened up as he tries to flick it
short of a length outside off, shuffles across and defends off the backfoot
short of a length, curving in from the fourth-stump line, Chandimal shoulders arms
fails to get on top of a short of a length delivery and gets hit on the pad as it angles into him
full on middle and leg, blocked back
short of a length on off, stands tall and blocks from the crease
full, drifts down the leg side as Mendis fails to put it away with a glance
short of a length, shuffles across and blocks down the pitch
shuffles across and gets on top before nudging this shortish one to short leg
short of a length, flicks past the right of short leg
pushes him back with a short ball that Mathews jumps and blocks
length, angled in, flicked to deep midwicket
closes the face to this short of a length delivery and gets a leading edge to point
full, nips away from the fourth-stump channel, left alone
length ball that swings away sharply and Mendis lets it go
short of a length, tries to flick and misses as the ball goes down the leg side
good length,breaks away off the deck around the fifth-stump channel and Mendis shoulders arms
short on off, but the ball doesn't bounce as much. Mathews half-ducks, and so the ball hits the outside of his right shoulder

back of a length outside off, and it's been tapped with soft hands to cover. They're off for a quick single, so the fielder has a shy at the stumps. He misses, and Powell (backing up) takes evasive action because of the bounce. The ball races away for overthrows as Roach can't collect in the deep
full on off, and he shuffles across to the off side. Gets inside the line of the ball, and defended to mid on
back of a length outside off. Mendis rides the bounce and blocks off the back foot
full on off, and the cover drive comes off the bat's inside half. Trickles down to Roach at deep midwicket
full outside off, but the ball stays very low. Goes to Dowrich on the bounce, and he gets his on his hand once again
full outside off, and Mathews gets on to the front foot to drive towards mid on
length ball outside off, and the delivery takes some extra bounce off the surface. Nice carry through into Dowrich's gloves
length ball outside off, and Mathews keeps his eyes on the ball. Defends with really soft hands off the back foot. Ensures the ball stays along the ground
fuller, and outside off. The ball shapes a bit away from Mathews, and he chooses to shoulder his arms
full outside off again. On that fifth-stump channel, and Mathews lets it go once more
almost a yorker on off stump. Tails in slightly too, so Mathews must play at it. Does well to dig it back towards the non-striker
sticks his bat out at a shortish one that gets a little big and shoots past the outside edge
shortish and angled in at pace, shuffles across and blocks without fuss
good stuff from Cummins. Lures him forward with a wide fuller one and gets it to shape away late to have him beaten
short of a length on off, opens the face to point
full on off, shuffles across and blocks
does the smart thing and shoulders arms to this wide one
jumps to a shortish one and it keeps a little low but he manages to keep it out. Holder's overstepped
muted appeal for caught behind. Shortish and angled in, gets him into a bit of a tangle, Mathews tries to glance and the ball perhaps grazed the thigh pad. No bat for sure
short of a length, nips away late and Mathews lets it go
short and angled in too much. Goes down the leg side
just back of a length, nips away, blocked from the crease
short ball, arches out of the way
short ball that pitches around off and cuts away to square him up and catch the thumb. Time for the magic spray to do its, umm, magic, I guess?

huge shout for leg before. Looks mighty close. Nothing from the umpire. Roach is literally pleading with the umpire. Surely they're gonna review this. Yup, Holder sends this upstairs. Short of a length that cuts in and hits him on the front pad. Mathews was jumping to deal with that, so the bounce could save him here. Yup, going over. Review lost.
back of a length outside off, tapped to cover-point
length outside off, blocked down the pitch
full on middle, clipped away to midwicket
short of a length, shuffles across and blocks
gets on top of a short of a length delivery and blocks
tossed up outside off and breaks away off the rough, left alone
sliding fuller one on leg, blocked
pitched up on middle and leg, blocked
stays back to a length ball and blocks
short of a length, makes some room to punch and finds point
full on middle and off, blocked to the off side
tossed up outside off, blocked
flighted outside off, defended down the pitch
lots of flight outside off, driven to cover
length, spins in, stays back and turns it away to midwicket
tossed up on middle and leg, flicked to the on side
flighted outside off, clumsy effort at midwicket as Mendis flicks and gets a brace
length on middle, blocked down the pitch
slides on with the arm and goes off the inside edge through square leg
non-turning back of a length delivery, makes room and slaps it through backward point
tossed up on middle, blocked
full on off, front-foot defence into the covers
non-turning length ball, puts his head down and blocks
back of a length delivery that rises very late. Mathews swings out of the way but the ball almost hits the head of Devon Smith at first slip
short of a length, cuts in, Mathews stands tall and blocks
short of a length, stands tall and punches to cover
pitched up on off, blocked
short and wide, cut to sweeper cover
pitched up on off, blocked
full toss, sliding into middle and leg, flicked behind square
pitched up around off, blocked
length ball that holds its line, left alone
short of a length, defended off the backfoot
length ball, gets slightly squared up as he looks to defend
short of a length, blocked off the backfoot
back of a length on off, shuffles across and defends
length ball on off, shuffles across to blocks
pitched up on off, blocked
advances down the ground and gets right to the pitch before hammering it wide of mid-off
pitched up on off, comes forward and blocks
sliding fuller ball on leg, clipped to fine leg
length ball, clipped to backward square leg
sees the fight and advances down the ground and drills this straight down the ground
full on the pads, flicked off the pads over backward square leg. Lands just over the boundary ropes
tossed up on middle and leg, comes forward and blocks
full outside off, comes forward to meet the pitch and drives languidly through the covers
short ball, jumps back and blocks
just back of a length, punched off the backfoot to mid-off
sliding fuller ball on leg, blocked off the front foot towards short leg
big turn and bounce off the rough outside off, comes forward and gets beaten
sliding fuller ball on middle and leg, blocked
length ball that spins away, opens the face to backward point

appeal for leg before. Short of a length, just drifting into his pads and catches Mathews, hanging on the backfoot, on the pad. Seemed to be heading down leg with that angle. Hit on the inside part of the bat. Hard to get that in your favour with that angle
short of good length, cuts into him around middle, blocks
short of a length on off, shuffles across and blocks
fullish length on off, uses the angle into him to flick it out to deep midwicket
full outside off, drives without feet and drills it out to mid-off

gets a short one outside off now and with Mathews' experience, he's ready for that. Stands tall and drags a pull down the ground to the long-on boundary. Sri Lanka making solid progress here. West Indies need a wicket now
short of a length, shuffles across and blocks
length on middle, gets down and sweeps to deep backward square leg
length, spins away towards off, blocks
length ball outside off, left alone
pitched up outside off, blocked off the front foot
full and flighted around off, blocked
short of good length on off, shuffles across and blocks
shortish on off, opens the face and fends it off to point
short of a length, gets on top of it and opens the face to backward point
back of a length outside off, blocked
full outside off, drilled to midwicket
length ball, angling in on off, punched towards mid-off
length ball outside off, and turns further away. Fended back to the cover region
tossed up on off stump, defended down the ground to mid on
good length, and turning further away outside off. Lets it go
dropped. Length ball outside off, and lesser turn this time. Tries to cut and gets an edge due to the extra bounce. Dowrich fails to gather it
flatter outside off, and he slaps it away past the point fielder to the man in the deep
good length on middle, and fended towards the off side
short of a length, angled in towards off, shuffles across and blocks
short of good length, nips away, shoulders arms
back of a length, defended off the inside of the bat down the pitch
short ball on off, jumps up and blocks
tossed up on middle, clipped to the on side
pitched up on the stumps, clipped past short leg
flighted outside off, drilled down to long-on along the ground
spins in sharply from outside off and gets hit on the pad as he comes forward to defend
spins in from a length, pats it away past short leg
flighted outside off, comes forward and blocks to the on side
short of a length outside off, jumps up and drops it between cover and point. Almost a direct hit at the keeper's end. Mendis was at the danger end
short of a length on off, shuffles across and blocks
short ball that climbs nastily. Fails to get on top of it entirely and gets a glove. Short of gully running forward
shuffles across to a short of a length delivery and blocks
full and angling in on middle and off, drilled down the pitch towards mid-on
length ball, spins in from outside off, defended off the inside of the bat
length ball that spins in, turned away to the on side
pitched up outside off, clipped to short leg
length, spins in, turned away to short leg
length ball, spinning in, tucked behind square
pitched up outside off, defended into the off side
short of a length on off, jumps and blocks
short of a length, cuts in, jumps and flicks to midwicket
shortish on off, gets on top of it and blocks
short of a length, nips away, beats him as he sticks his bat out
short of a length, curves in late, Mendis shoulders arms
shortish delivery, angles in, tucked behind square
back of a length, backs away and cuts to cover
flighted on the stumps, blocked down the pitch
length ball, lets it spin in, shuffles across and tucks behind short leg
length outside off, shuffles across and drills into the leg side
full and flighted, clipped off the pads to the on side
short down the leg side, Mendis doesn't really have to do anything to avoid it
length ball outside off, Mendis strides forward and defends to point with an open face
fullish length on off, blocked down the pitch
hesitation! Almost ends in a run out. Mendis drills it into the covers and they start and stop. And start and stop. And start... and then Mathews decides to send him back. A dive saves him
short, gets on top of it and slashes it out to deep point
low full toss outside off, pushed to mid-off
length, spins in and keeps a little low, flicked behind square
just back of a length ball, spins in, nudges it to the fine leg region
short of a length outside off,  drags a pull down the ground
flighted up around off, clipped to midwicket
tucks behind square. One short of a fifty now
short of a length outside off, shuffles across and blocks down the pitch
short of a length, punches this firmly into the covers
short ball outside off, hangs back and opens the face to backward point
slashes at a short one but doesn't get the room he's looking for. The ball goes over the ball. Dowrich just feebly throws his arms up but there's nothing on it
drills a fuller one straight back at Cummins who gets his boot in the way of the ball
short of a length, angled in, flicked behind square to fine leg. Fifty for Mendis
back of a length outside off, and he backs away to push it towards cover point. Gentle hands
full on middle, and punched off the front foot. The ball trickles down to mid on
full outside off, and driven away from his body. The ball was shaping away so Mendis was forced to reach at it. Mistimed to mid off
back of a length outside off, and fended off the back foot
back of a length outside off, and forces the batsman to get out of the ball's line. Whizzes past his helmet to the keeper
full on off, and he walks towards the off side to cover the delivery's line. Drives to mid on thereafter. Maiden after drinks
in the air! But drops short of point. Short ball on off that forces the batsman to get uncomfortable. He puts his bat near his face, and that induces the outside edge
good length on middle, and flicked off his pads to the fielder at deep backward square. They jog across for one
length ball outside off, and he cuts it off the back foot with the bat's open face. Goes to point
good length outside off, and goes straight through to the keeper. Mendis shoulders his arms
full just outside off, and driven towards cover
puts the over's last ball away! Too wide outside off, and he throws his hands at it to cut it past backward point. Still a quick outfield
back of a length outside off, cut off the back foot to cover point. They take an aim at the stumps, but the batsman was in already
full on off, and he gets onto the back foot. Blocked to mid on
full on middle, and flicked off the pads to deep midwicket. Fielder there though
back of a length on middle, and Mendis ducks under the ball this time. Goes to Dowrich on the bounce
good length on middle, and angling into his body. Tucks it around the corner to square leg
full outside off and he gets to the pitch of the delivery on this occasion. Driven to cover, but man there again
goes short to start off. Cramps Mendis up, but he manages to open his stance and nudge it to fine leg
slower ball on leg, and going down leg. He tries to flick it to fine leg, but misses
length ball on middle, and nicely deflected off his hips to play it fine down the leg side. More runs to collect
length ball on leg stump, and Mathews walks to the off side to let the ball go down leg. Safe

oh man, feather touch down the leg side! Commentator's curse, perhaps, but Mathews was living dangerously while shuffling to the off side. The ball was on middle, and Mathews tried to work it fine down the leg side. Deflected straight into the gloves of Dowrich
back of a length outside off, and shaping away from the batsman. Roshen chooses to let it go to the keeper
full on middle, and driven to mid on. No run on offer
good length on middle, and worked off his hips to deep midwicket. They jog across for one
almost a full toss outside off. He's through his cover drive too early, so mistimes it to holder at cover. They go for the single anyway
good length on off, and blocked off the back foot to mid on
good length outside off, and punched off the back foot through the covers. Caressed to the boundary ropes
back of a length outside off, and carved off the back foot to cover point

almost chopped on! Length ball outside off, and the ball tails in sharply. Tries to run it down to third man, but the ball hits his handle instead. In two minds, and therefore played rather dangerously
back of a length on middle, and pushed behind square on the leg side. Work for the man at fine leg, which means Roshen can collect two more
full just outside off, and Roshen goes forward to defend it. Checks his shot eventually
full on leg stump, but goes down the leg side. Roshen opts to flick, but can't connect with the bat
good length outside off, and worked off his hips to the leg side. Packed leg-side field inside the circle
full on off, and driven straight. Off the bat's inside half, but goes past mid on anyway. Chase for Gabriel to long on, and his dedication ensures the ball doesn't go for a boundary
good length on middle, but angling down the leg side. Roshen goes to the off side to flick it fine, but the ball sways away and away
length ball outside off. Too wide for Roshen to mess with it. Shoulders his arms
full on middle, and worked off his pads to the fielder at fine leg. They jog across for one
goes all the way! Hooks it over the fielder at deep midwicket. Spots the short ball early and swivels to angle it behind square. Uses Roach's pace excellently
length ball outside off, and Mendis rocks back and punches it straight down the ground. Roach recovers well to stick his right hand out and stop the ball
full on off, and he shuffles to cover the off stump. Taps it back thereafter
angling into middle, and flicked off his hips to midwicket. Kieran Powell dives over the ball, and therefore allows SL to get an extra run
angling into his pads once again. Turned off his legs to square leg
wide outside off, and rising further after hitting the deck. Left alone by Roshen
full just outside off, and holds its shape. Roshen tries to drive but pulls his shot back. The ball goes past his outside edge
on middle, and nudged off his legs to deep backward square. Holder's lost some pace now. Tired look on his face
length ball on leg, and he comfortably works it around the corner to Kemar Roach at fine leg. He'll keep strike
length ball outside off, but it's the topspinner to start off. Zips through to the keeper
full just outside off, and driven with the turn to cover. Encouraging the batsman to go for it
flighted outside off, and turning away. Entices him to drive, and takes the bat's outside edge. Shouts of 'catch it', but the ball goes past Chase at short fine leg
full on off stump. Driven to wide mid on on this occasion
good length on middle. He rocks back and defends it towards cover
tossed up on leg, and that's been slogged towards the leg side. Plays a cross-batted shot, but ensures it's played along the ground. Team 150
on the fourth-stump channel, and punched off the back foot to Bishoo at cover
full on middle, and played towards the leg-side. Drives at it, but comes off the bat's inside half. Runs down to deep backward square
full on middle, and whipped through the mid-wicket region. Another couple for the batting side. Target under 300 runs away now
short, and angling into his body. Mendis stands tall and fends it firmly to the leg side. Concentration.
short outside off, but he backs away to make some room. Punches it to cover
full outside off, and he pushes at it with soft hands. Takes the bat's outside edge, but rolls past the slip cordon to the third-man boundary. Runs flowing...
length ball on middle, and flicked off his hips to Roach at fine leg
full and wide outside leg. Turning into his pads, and Mendis does some pad-love by stretching out and pushing the ball away
full outside leg again, and Mendis uses the same tactic. Big stride forward and padded away safely
full toss on off, and that's been smothered down the ground to the long-off boundary. Easy pickings, and the set Mendis just obliges
full on middle, and defended back to Bishoo
length ball on middle, and fended back to the leg side off the back foot
short on middle, and soars over Roshen's ducking head
full on middle, and clipped off his toes to midwicket. Diving effort from the fielder means it's only a single
full on off, and that's been driven straight. Past the non-striker but stopped by Holder at mid on
wide outside off, and carved off the back foot past point to the sweeper fielder in the deep
full on leg, and worked off his pads to deep midwicket. Hope's there, and he cleans up. Still enough time to take the second
good length on middle, and defended off the back foot to mid off
length ball outside leg. Trying to use the rough outside the stumps, but comfortably whipped off his legs to deep midwicket
half tracker on leg, and that's been pulled over midwicket to the boundary. Quick to get into position and now Mendis gets to his nineties
length ball outside leg. Mendis backs away and nudges it to deep backward square for a walking single
full on off, and dug away towards mid on. No spin on this occasion

soft, soft catch! The ball kinda stopped on Silva, and therefore he found the leading edge to the bowler. Was short, and Silva tried to work it towards midwicket. the ball takes the edge, and pops up straight into the hands of Bishoo.
full just outside off, but Gamage offers the proper front-foot defense. Tapped to the cover region
good length on middle. Turned off his pads to the leg side
back of a length outside off. Too wide, and well left by Gamage

full on off, and that stays low. The ball hits the under-edge of his bat and then hits his front leg. Big appeal for lbw, but turned down. They contemplate reviewing, but Holder thinks there was an inside edge. What do replays say? Yep, huge inside edge.
yorker on middle, but Gamage's got his eyes on the ball. Gets his bat down in time, and blocks it away
whizzes past the outside of his bat. The ball pitched outside off, and tests Gamage's defense. The batsman pushed forward, but the delivery went through to Dowrich's gloves
overpitched, but wide outside off. Gamage prods forward but then lets the harmless delivery go past him
testing length to start off. Lands on middle, and soars past Mendis' leg side. He tries to nudge it fine, but he finds no contact. Dowrich can't hold onto it either
fuller, and wide outside off. The ball hits the pitch, and shapes further away. Mendis loads up for the drive, but just pulls his shot back at the last moment. Through to the keeper
length ball outside off, and through to Dowrich. Mendis shoulders his arms
full just outside off, and Mendis comes forward to drive. Can't find runs, but will be pleased that it came off the bat's sweet spot
full, but going down the leg side. Mendis tries flicking it to square leg, but can't connect with the delivery
full on middle, and he's worked this off the pads to the fielder at deep midwicket. Keeps the nightwatchman off the strike
full on middle, and he shuffles across to the off side. Pushes it to mid on

stays low! And that's what the experts were talking about before the start of play. Lands outside off, and goes past the bat's outside edge as well as the offstump. Through to Dowrich on the bounce. Will keep the bowler interested
full on middle, and knocked into the vacant midwicket region. The fielder from mid on runs in and cleans up
short! On off stump, and aimed at the nightwatchman's body. Gamage ducks under the line of the ball and negates that well
propah shot. Full on middle, and flicked off his legs to deep backward square leg. Comes back for the second run, and hey, that's his highest Test score!
length ball on middle, and Gamage somehow manages to play this towards short fine leg. Came off his thigh pad, I think
length ball outside off, and seaming nicely into Mendis. He shoulders his arms, but the ball gets perilously close to the outside of off stump
full on leg stump, and whipped away to the leg side. Chase for fine leg, but he can't cut it off. Fifth Test hundred for Kusal Mendis.
full on leg stump, and clipped off his toes to fine leg. Gets Gamage on strike for three deliveries
length ball outside off. Gently pushed off the front foot to cover point
aimed at his pads, and tapped off the back foot to midwicket
full on middle, and jagging in sharply. Gamage misses the defense, and the ball raps him on the pads. Too high, so Holder pulls back his appeal for lbw
good length outside off, and Mendis pokes at the delivery. Outside-edges this punch to point
back of a length on off, but gets big on Mendis. He tiptoes and blocks off the back foot. Played with soft hands, so the ball lands near his feet
full outside off, and he tries to execute the on-drive. Gets to the pitch of the ball, but mistimes the shot to the infielder
the start of that dreaded no-ball epidemic. Full outside off, and defended back to the bowler. He's a tall man, but that's no excuse for the extras
full on off, and he covers his off stump, and then pushes this past the non-striker. Hit far enough from mid on for Mendis to call for the run. Gabriel's not too pleased
length ball on off, but the ball takes off! Smacks Gamage's right glove, and he's in some pain. The ball jammed his hand onto his handle
full on leg, and that's been clipped off his pads to fine leg. The fielder does well to make some ground and cut this off
back of a length outside off, and Gamage rides the bounce to tap it towards point. He's in pain though. Tries to shake away the sting off his finger.
back of a length outside off once again, nudged to the off side with soft hands
length ball outside off, and straightens after pitching. Gamage covers his off stump, and then shoulders his arms
length ball outside off, and seaming slightly away after pitching. Left alone
length on off, and pushed off the front foot towards the off side. Off the bat's outside half, so the ball rolls away to backward point
full on middle, and hits Gamage's pads as he tries to flick it towards the leg side. Appeal in unison, but Aleem Dar isn't interested. Would've gone down leg stump
back of a length outside off, but Mendis goes onto the back foot and pushes it away to the off side
back of a length outside off, and he rides the bounce to fend it off the back foot. No ball again!
wayward! Full on leg, and going waaaay down the leg side. Dowrich dives to his left and somehow manages to stop the ball
overpitched outside off, and he just about manages to dig the ball away. The ball, though, bounces up again, hits Mendis' helmet, and almost drops on leg stump. Lucky
full outside off, and Mendis lets it go through to Dowrich this time
back of a length outside off, but always angling into the batsman. He blocks it off the back foot, and plays it to cover point

in a rare occasion, the extra ball actually pays off for the bowling side! And it's not even a no ball... Mendis must go. Length ball outside off, but the delivery jumps off the surface and surprises the batsman. He tries to pull his bat out of the ball's way, but the ball zoots past the bat, takes a touch of his glove, and then finds Dowrich's hands. Unplayable, says Ian Bishop on commentary
back of a length outside off, and Gamage sways away from the ball's line
full on middle stump, and he tries to flick it towards the leg side. Slow to play the shot, and the ball raps his front leg. Appeal for lbw, but once again, going down leg side
full outside off, and left alone by Gamage. He's not tempted to go for the drive
full on off, and he defends off the front foot. Plays it towards the leg side, but goes straight to short leg. Needs to see off two more balls
full on middle, but angling down once again. Gamage did try to flick it square, but the ball hits his leg instead
full on off, and he carefully keeps his eyes on the ball, and defends it with soft hands to cover. Chandimal to take strike next over
length ball outside off, but angles sharply inwards. The ball stays low too, so Chandimal adjusts his shot at the last moment. Drops his shoulders and defends it back to the bowler
length ball outside off, and he rocks back onto the back foot. Blocked to cover
length ball outside off, but stays low once again. Gabriel delivers the ball from really wide, and Chandimal defends. The ball, however, takes the bottom edge, and bounces through to Dowrich
length ball on off, and nudged off the back foot to the vacant square on the leg side. They jog across for one
full outside off, and that's rather perfect for Gamage. Just shoulders his arms and lets it go
length ball on off, and extra bounce for Gamage to deal with. He has foresight this time, and takes one hand off the bat's handle, and then defends it off the back foot
length ball, but very wide outside off. Left alone
full outside off, and Chandimal gets onto the front foot. Thinks about driving, but eventually shoulders his arms
pitches outside off, but angles in sharply. Blocked off the front foot towards cover
full on leg, and clipped off his pads to square leg. In the air for a bit, but wide enough of the fielder there
length ball outside off, and Gamage defends with the bat's open face. Played to point
whizzes past his outside edge! So close to the bat, but shapes away after pitching on length, and then goes into Dowrich's gloves
what a ripper! He'll bowl poorer deliveries and get wickets. This just hit one spot and took off, Chandimal shaped to defend but had to quickly pull out as the ball whizzed past his gloves.
snorter of a delivery, again! Another lifter from short of length on off, Chandimal is hopping and bouncing all over as he evades this one. Once again, not too far from his gloves as he arched back
this one's short but a touch wide as well, easily avoided.
angles in a length ball from wide of the crease, Chandi hops back and defends with soft hands
length outside off, this keeps low and scoots to the keeper on the bounce as Chandimal leaves
just a touch fuller on off, angling in from wide so Chandimal is slightly squared up as he pushes back, but somehow manages to keep it out. May have been better off playing forward.
manages to defend a short of length delivery angling in.
floats this full and just around off stump, Gamage gets a good stride in as he defends
short and angling down leg, Gamage sights it early and ducks away without much trouble
full on off, this time Gamage isn't fully forward but is on the move as he defends
attacks the stumps again, this keeps a touch low but Gamage manages to avoid it.
back of length outside off, scoots low to the keeper as the batsman leaves.
hops back and works this short of length ball to deep square leg
full on off, gets this to move away off the deck, watched through to the keeper
angles a short ball into the body, he hops back and defends with soft hands towards short leg.
this is another ripper from Cummins that is perilously close to the glove as he looks to evade the bouncer. Tried to take the bottom hand off the grip but it was too late by then
short of length that holds its line from outside off, left alone
right behind the line of this short of length ball as he defends
tossed up and drifting in from wide of the crease, Chandimal defends
takes the edge, but short of slip! Ripper. Sharp turn, he was drawn forward to jab this away. Extra bounce
fired full on off, he lunges forward and blocks
touch short, he makes room and eases this to deep point
hint of turn from outside off, left alone
thick edge but lands short of Holder as he defends
hops back as he defends this back down the pitch off a leading edge. Looked to turn this square
can't tickle this away, erratic delivery down leg. On the bounce to the keeper
nudges this short of length delivery past square leg as they jog the single
defends this length ball with an angled bat towards point
short but angling down, Gamage ducks without fretting
hops back and defends with soft hand, rolls to short leg.
flatter one at length on off, defended
drifts in full on middle, gets this to bounce as Chandimal dabs this back. Took the bottom hand off. Nice dip on it
fired full on off, eased wide of cover for an easy single
good stride in as he defends this full and flat delivery
there for the drive again, nicely tossed up, but he's fully forward in defence

set him up beautifully there. Kept bowling the legbreaks and then drew him forward again, except this time it was a googly that beat Gamage's forward prod. Hit on the knee roll, no inside edge, so the only thing that could've saved him was if this was missing. Hawkeye shows this would've crashed into middle and leg. Not only do Sri Lanka lose their nightwatchman but they also lose a review. Horrendous review. Why would they waste it on a tailender? I'm not too sure. Holder and co celebrate.
hops back an defends this short of length delivery to the off side.
punches this short of length delivery to cover
pushes him back with another short delivery angling in, Chandimal defends with soft hands.
touch fuller on off, defended
peach! Not sure how he didn't nick that. Short of good length that zips through on off, Chandimal caught on the crease as he wafts at that
plays back when he could've well been forward, kept a touch low but defended carefully.
angles in from wide of the crease, defended with soft hands
sweeps and misses, this lobs off the forearm to leg gully.
goes back into the crease and turns this shortish delivery to the leg side.
short and spinning back into middle and leg, tucked to deep backward square leg
tossed up and spinning away from outside off, left alone
beauty! Drift, bounce and dip, Chandimal lunges forward and defends with soft hands/
sliding down, worked to fine leg
right behind the line of this incoming length delivery as he defends
angles in from wide of the crease, hits the deck and straightens to square Chandimal up as he defends.
back of length outside off, left alone.
hops back as this length ball hurries into him as he defends, hit the top part of the bat
punched straight to backward point
beaten as he looks to fetch a sweep from outside off
spinning down leg, tucked to deep fine leg
nice flight as he lands this on middle, defended back
driven carefully to short cover. Once again generously tossed up.
fired full on off, eased to the off side again
beauty! Drew him forward and got this to spin appreciably to beat the outside edge.
full just outside off, and that's been caressed through the covers. Struck firmly through the infield. Team 200
length ball outside off, and Dickwella tries to defend. But the ball comes in a bit too much, and finds the outside of his bat. Edged down past gully for four
full, and aimed at off stump. Defended firmly back off the front foot
full just outside off, and he's quick to go onto the front foot. Defended
sneaks past the bat's outside edge! Roach thought he had his man. Full outside off and he attempts the check-drive, but the ball goes through to Dowrich
back of a length outside off, and stays rather low. Dickwella lets it go
wrong'un to start off. Full outside off, but spinning inwards this time. Pushed towards cover
half-tracker outside off, and Chandimal rocks deep into his crease. Slog-pulls this over midwicket, and while it's mistimed, there's enough behind it to go for four
full on off, and this time he skips down the wicket. Drives through the ball's line to cover, and gets off strike
full outside off, and driven through to cover point. Man there
length ball outside off, but turns sharply into the left-hander. Worked off his hips to the leg side
flighted, but lands outside off stump. Comes in sharply, but Dickwella keeps his eyes on the ball and nudges it to the leg side
back of a length outside off, but doesn't bounce as much as Chandimal expects it to be. He drops his knees and ducks, but the ball barely goes over his shoulder
full on off, and he shuffles across to the off side, before tapping it to mid on
full on off, and he covers his off stump, before nudging it to the leg side. Soft hands
full outside off, but aimed at his off stump. Chandimal defenses with soft hands, and plays it to cover point
full on middle, and steered off his toes to deep backward square leg. A couple, atleast. But Roach has overstepped
full on off, and he keeps his eyes on the ball. Not much footwork, but still manages to defend it towards the leg side
full on middle, and he defends to see the over off. Chandimal asks for drinks as soon as the over ends. Hopefully, it's not dehydration again
full outside off, and turning in sharply. Dickwella takes a big stride forward and blocks it away
full, but wide outside off. Dickwella goes to the pitch of the delivery, and then pushes to cover
full outside off, and Dickwella fends it to cover point once again. Big strides always
flatter ball, and spins in sharply after pitching outside off. The bounce surprises Dickwella, but he manages to keep the ball down
full on off, and spinning into his pads. Dickwella rocks back, and meets his from leg stump and works it towards short leg
back of a length outside off, defended towards the off side. Maiden over
flighted full, and lands outside off. Chandimal tries to sweep and misses the shot. Raps him on the pad, and while everyone appeals, the impact was outside off stump. Not out
full outside off, and he walks across to the off side to cut the angle off. Defended to cover
full outside off, and he carefully plays it towards the off side. Hits it from under his eyes
extra flight, and lands full on middle stump. Tapped towards the non-striker, which short mid on intercepts
lbw appeal, but it's not very loud. Too high, I think. It was a length ball on off, that came in sharply and hit Chandimal's pads
fuller outside off, and smothered against the spin to cover. Driven well, but straight to the fielder. Second maiden in a row
full outside off, asks Dickwella to drive, but he only defends
outside off, and blocked off the front foot again
wider outside off, so Dickwella has to reach at it. Defends with soft hands
full outside off, and turns in sharply! Stays low too, and Dickwella does well to defend it off the back foot. Could've easily crashed into his stumps
tossed up outside off, and Dickwella gets down on one knee to sweep it excellently past short leg and the vacant square region on the leg side. Release shot
full outside off, and Dickwella covers his off stump. Defended with soft hands
full just outside off. Chandimal takes a big stride forward and taps it towards cover

miscued at mid on! Seven minutes before lunch. Oh dear, Chandimal, what have you done. Full on off, and he tries to slog it over the infield. Comes down the ground, but loses his shape as he tries to smack it towards the on-side. Slices it, and Brathwaite calls early for the catch. Difficult catch, especially since he the ball was always going away from him
delicately played! Full on leg stump, and he laps it fine down the leg side. Comfortably executed by Dickwella
tries to be cheeky, and almost pays for it. Length ball outside off, and he tries to ramp it fine down the leg side. Off the bat's sticker area, and falls just beyond short leg
full outside off, and he tries to drive through cover. Toe-ends it, so the ball goes nowhere

appeal for lbw, and given! Two in one over. Roston Chase the trump card! Dickwella's reviewing though. Full, and lands just outside off. Slides in slightly, and hits Dickwella's front pad as he prods forward. No bat on UltraEdge, and the ball would've gone on to hit the top of middle stump. SL seven down, and the umpires call for lunch.
length ball on middle, and that's been whipped off the pads to deep midwicket. Gets off the mark
full outside off, and it spins in, but not as much as Herath expected. Goes past the bat's outside edge
length ball outside off, and tapped back to the off side
full outside off, and Herath prods forward. The ball stays low and whizzes past his outside edge. Lucky he isn't stumped
full outside off, and spinning inwards. Fended off the front foot
full just outside off, and defended. Sees the over out. Just one off it
full outside off, and spins in just a little bit. Perera expected more turn, so defends it inside the ball's line
full outside off, and defended off the front foot. Firmly struck this time
length ball outside off, and tapped away to cover point
full just outside off. Smothers the ball to the leg side off the front foot
full outside off, and he takes a big stride forward. Defends, but the ball takes some extra bounce. Off his handle
length ball on middle, and nudged off his pads to square leg. Keeps strike
full on off, and played against the turn by Perera. Driven to mid on, and gets Herath back on strike
length ball outside off, and Herath stays on the back foot. Flicks to the leg side

full just outside off, and Herath tries to work it towards the leg side. Some extra bounce off the rough, and the ball finds his inside edge, and lobs straight to forward short leg. West Indies two wickets away...
welcomes Lakmal with the wrong'un. Full outside off, and spinning inwards. Blocked

length ball outside off, and Lakmal carves it away to point. Misfield by Chase, but he recovers well to throw at the non-striker's. Lakmal was not looking at the ball but Perera was almost at the other end. Throw's good, but Bishoo can't collect the ball. Perera survives, having almost run two runs on his own
length ball on middle, and turned off his pads to midwicket for one

length ball outside off, and spinning in sharply. Lakmal pushes at it, and the goes past his outside edge. Well taken by Dowrich, and they appeal for the caught behind. Given by umpire Kettleborough. Lakmal is bemused, but SL don't have any reviews left. Replays show daylight between bat and ball. Oh my

length ball on middle, and the ball sneaks through bat and pad as he tries to defend. Takes the inside edge, and snaffled by Dowrich. They appeal long and hard, and finally the umpire raises his finger. West Indies win by 226 runs!
